Break Up! And Find Love... is a pair matching game where you must break lovers couple to match them with their real soul mate. It can be played on both Windows and iPads.

Across 4 chapters and 48 levels, spread the love by reuniting people with their soul mate (or at least someone they will be more happy with)!

name: Breachway
summary: Assemble your crew, load out your ship, and explore the galaxy in this deck-building space roguelike. Your deck is determined by your spaceship's loadout, mix and match equipment to discover different powerful card synergies, and obliterate your enemies in tactical space battles

name: Brazilian Street Food Simulator
summary: Experience the dynamics of preparing Brazilian Street Food, such as Sugar Cane Juice, Pastel, and Tapioca. Play around with typical equipment, vehicles and processes from Brazilian street vendors. A casual simulator game without time pressure.

name: Brave
summary: In the action RPG "Brave", you'll handle a sword and magic, defeat an enemies and search for Orb unexploited somewhere.

name: Bruce Lee: Iron Fist 3D
summary: 3D figting game for J2ME cellphones featuring Bruce Lee.

name: Breaking the Silent Lies
summary: Breaking the Silent Lies - He has to relive the trauma from his past in order to save her.

name: Brewmastery: Tavern Simulator
summary: Brewmastery is an innkeper & beer brewery simulator. Build your own brewery and revive the old Tavern. Develop your territory, grow ingredients and try different recipes in a realistic brewing process. Tavern guests can tell you stories & give tasks. And don't forget to pull apart drunk Orcs!

name: Brawler Bro's
summary: Brawler Bro’s is an arcade kickboxing beat em up title featuring challenging fights against Ai and human opponents. Each fighters stats are dynamically adapting to the situation of the fight leading to challenging encounters which always leave room for a comeback story of the underdog.

name: Broken God Awakening
summary: "If you don't want this city to be in ruins, let me stay here for one night." Seeing the girl in black who forcibly broke into her house, Mikage Du couldn't understand the meaning of her words at this fashion.

name: Brichi Quest
summary: Brichi Quest - adventure roguelite. Gameplay is a mix of Dont Starve and Zelda in lowpoly style. Explore randomly generated islands and dungeons in search of special items. Build your character set and fight the final boss.

name: Broken Build Simulator
summary: Love roguelites? Well so do I! So I made a game that combines them all, with modes like 20 Minutes Till Lunch and Vampire Revivers. Blast away at ridiculous monsters in this highly detailed and accurate simulation of what playing a video game is like.

name: Brawler Bots!
summary: Dungeon clearing + pvp , in a world of robots. Fully customize your own robot to hack & slash your way through virus infected bots, Save the world, then take that gear into PVP and test your metal against the top players in a competitive environment! Do you have what it takes to be #1?

name: Broken Legs
summary: A blurb? They expect you to write? You're Lottie Plum so you're not going into writing. You sing. And dance and act up a storm while everyone else can only manage a puddle. You belong at Bridger. No matter what it takes.

name: Breakthrough Gaming Activity Center: ZJ the Ball's Collect Stuff
summary:
This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!
Purchase and play our new Christian themed video games releasing every Sunday morning in the PlayStation Store today!

name: Broilers
summary: Broilers is a turn-based game that resembles chess and similar board games, but only externally. The basis of almost all of the mechanics in Broilers, is selection (breeding). Learn how to breed new species and their characteristics in order to win the online challenge.

name: Broken Boughs
summary: An cancelled Silent Hill inspired first person adventure game made by Ben "Yahtzee" Croshaw.

name: Brick Breaker: Ball Shooter
summary: Welcome to the classic brick breaker game! Shoot and break bricks and become the ball master! Keep up with the bouncing ball and deflect it with your paddle in this classic breakout game! Join the brick world and enjoy all the different challenges and puzzles that await you!

name: Brain Switch Out
summary:
Brain switch out is the ideal memory trainer game for everybody who loves to play addictive brain challenging games. On the off chance that you appreciate playing memory match games then you will love this new free endless game!
The main objective of this addictive endless game is to watch the emplacement of some cubes and try to find them correctly after we hide them. But, keep in mind that you should remember the correct place of each cube as you can find them easily or you will lose. Remember also that there is no timer, so you can take as much time as you want to find the cubes and go to the following level.

name: Bricks Breaker Puzzle Classic
summary: Easy and minimal game play! Most addictive! Enjoy the most exciting moment!

name: Brigand: Battles
summary: Brigand: Battles is a small DLC that uses some old modified maps and makes the player fight major battles. You can select one of three maps at the beginning to challenge you with extremely difficult and action-packed combat.

name: Breathless
summary: Breathless is a large, Boom compatible slaughter map for Doom 2. The theme is deep blues punctuated with cyan and is heavily inspired by Swim with the Whales, both in aesthetics and difficulty. The wad is inspired by a lot of things visually though, from Metroid Prime's Phazon Mines to Sunder.

name: Bridge Tactics
summary: In Bridge Tactics, you must place and manage your dynamites to damage all of your enemies Vehicles while they cross the bridge

name: Brine Flow
summary:
Fish him out and make HIM whole again!

Made for #FishingHorrorJam

name: Breath of the Gods
summary: Knowing the true potential of humanity, the True Gods are fighting to preserve humankind. The War will be settled by two Chosen Ones, both sons of Gods, brothers in blood, enemies in the battlefield.

name: Breadsticks
summary: A speed-based platformer with throwable platforms! Travel through the dangers in the woods as a fox boy to join afternoon tea with Mr. Bear.

name: Broken In Time
summary: Broken In Time is an action/adventure Turn based RPG. You (Titus) will explore different dimensions, solve puzzles, fight demons and monsters and ally with the other hero's around the multiverse!

name: Broken Pearl
summary: Spiritual successor to Twin Tiger Shark

name: Brigands and Barbarians
summary:
Brigands and Barbarians is the RPG that let's you tap your way to treasure and old-school adventure! Choose from five avatars including Barbarians, Brigands, Archer, Wizard, and Sorceress. Defeat the evil goblins and dragons as you cleanse the lands of Charedon of their evil stench!
Only you through the power of your nimble fingers can save this land. Only your quick touch can slay the mighty dragon! Wait no more and dare to enter this land of adventure!

name: Brain On: Can You Pass It?
Brain Memory
summary: Help your child harness the hidden potential of their mind. Use these colorfull cards to improve their memory skills. Let them become the masters of their own minds.

name: Bridge to Another World: Cursed Clouds - Collector's Edition
summary: A terrible curse has descended upon the heavenly island city of Celestis, and you’re its citizens’ only hope!

name: Bride Corruption
summary: Do you need a wedding planner, by any chase? "Weddings & Co." will organise your wedding, take care of everything you need, and as a bonus - corrupt the bride!

name: Bratz
summary:
This PS game brings the Bratz characters together in an adventure designed for girls of all ages. Unlike more traditional dolls such as Barbie, Bratz features a style inspired by Japanese anime and hip-hop fashion. The characters also come from a variety of ethnic backgrounds, which has helped fuel the popularity of the franchise.

Dress up to get down and be a Bratz superstar!

name: Bright Sudoku
summary: Bright Sudoku is a unique Sudoku game, which includes traditional Sudoku games and original three-dimensional Sudoku games. The new 3D Sudoku experience brings more difficult Sudoku problems. The newly added dimensions make Sudoku solving more difficult. Come and experience!

name: Broken Lens
summary: Broken Lens is a cosy game about spotting the differences between two scenes and thus discover the story of a little broken robot. Will you be able to uncover all the secrets?

name: Breach & Clear: Frozen Synapse Pack
summary: The Breach & Clear Frozen Synapse Pack adds a new team as well as five new missions based on the hit game Frozen Synapse.

name: Breathspace
summary: Breathspace is an action-roguelike in a sci-fi setting.

name: Broken Reality 2000
summary: The sequel to everyone's favorite single-player adventure set on the internet about our digital lives.

name: Brotherly Aid
summary: Brotherly Aid is a Soviet dissident rail shooter against the Soviet-Afghan war.

name: Breachers
summary: A multiplayer 5v5 tactical VR FPS in which Enforcers and Revolters - with access to a variety of weapons and gadgets - shoot, vault, climb and strategize their way to victory.

name: Breakout
summary: A VMU game released with Cardcaptor Sakura: Tomoyo no Video Daisakusen.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Brave Soldier: Invasion of Cyborgs
summary: Brave Soldier: Invasion Of Cyborgs is a pixel art platform game with a lot of action. Help the soldier save the world from the Cyborg Invasion! Good Luck!

name: Bridge Engineer
summary: Tackle Bridge Engineering problems like never before! You are an Engineer tasked with building Bridges for different types of vehicles from an SUV to a large Truck!

name: Breakout
summary: Breakout is an upcoming action video game developed by Intellivision Entertainment. It is scheduled to be released for the Intellivision Amico as one of the console's launch titles.

name: Broken Universe + Clumsy Rush
summary: Roco is just an everyday racoon. He's just given his sweetheart a pretty necklace... which caused the entire universe to explode! She's nowhere to be found and he's the only one who can save her. Clumsy Rush is a guaranteed dose of a laugh for friends and family.

name: Broken Through
summary:
7 years ago, your best friend Leo Williams mysteriously disappeared, and no one had the slightest clue where he went.

Seven years after this incident, Leo was declared dead since no one could find him.

And now you are in possession of his belongings.

But something about his stuff seems off...

Something says he's still out there.

And many more too.

Broken Through is a full length psychological story rich horror game experience that blends terrifying scenarios with dreamish visuals combined with a nostalgic retro theme.

Wander through this world with caution at all time.

There’s more than what meets the eye.

name: Brave
summary:
Follows the storyline of the Disney/Pixar film, "Brave", and features the voice of Princess Merida.

Learning games teach a variety of subjects including shapes, logic, problem-solving, spelling, vocabulary, and life science.

name: Brick Odyssey
summary:
Brick Odyssey is a roguelike game built around block-breaker mechanics.
Upgrade your bricks to become stronger and fight unique enemies with special abilities.

name: Bridge Race
summary: Join the adventure with more than 1000 levels that contain mechanisms such as sliders, trampolines, zip-lines, ladders, and elevators! Collect blocks of your own color and build bridges with them.

name: Brain Switch
summary: A quiz game.

name: Brawlhalla BCX 2022 Pack
summary: Be a part of the seventh Brawlhalla World Championship with the BCX 2022 Pack! This limited time pack contains 300 Mammoth Coins, the BCX 2022 Avatar and an exclusive Mammoth Rocketfan Sidekick. A must-have for followers of Brawlhalla esports!

name: Break the Fireline
summary: A clone of Space Invaders and Galaxian. Released in Sega Mega Drive Flashback.

name: Brazen Thief
summary: Top Down View is a game where you have to fight off all the enemies. Your hero is a thief and he will not be allowed to leave so easily. Throw carrots at them, but do not forget to pick it up again. Knock out medicines from them to last as long as possible. I know you will succeed!

name: Break Everything: Living room
summary: The game is a fun shooter made on Unreal 5. You need to use a toy rifle to shoot balls to break all the objects in the room.

name: Brain Teaser Bundle
summary: Tease your brain in a playful way!

name: Brain Tester: Mind trick quiz
summary: This game is about riddles and mind trick quiz with all the reason needed for each answer. Also a cute girl. :3 You will need all your brain power to clear this "Very fun" game Good luck, have fun and don't give up.

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Premium Edition
summary:
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your own breakfast kitchen?

In Breakfast Bar Tycoon, you'll learn that it's no easy task!

name: Broken Universe + Brawl Chess
summary: Roco is just an everyday racoon. He's just given his sweetheart a pretty necklace... which caused the ENTIRE universe to explode! She's nowhere to be found and he's the only one who can save her. Are you ready to become a chess champion? Choose your hero and challenge other players in the game of kings.

name: BraveNine Story
summary:
An extraordinary adventure story of the unstoppable mercenary group!
Brave Nine mercenaries are back in a new Visual Novel RPG, BraveNine Story!
Why did this young noble man from a prestigious family become a runaway overnight?

name: Brain Box Quiz: Trivia Fun
summary:
Brain Box Quiz: Trivia Fun is a fun comedy quiz game, starring the eponymous joke and pun cracking host.
You'll answer questions in seven trivia categories, testing your knowledge on entertainment, music, sport, general knowledge, history, geography and literature.
Quiz questions on Trivia Fun are full of jokes and laughs, and there's 100s to play! There's loads of questions about your most-loved movies, TV shows, music acts and sport stars.
You'll be laughing along to the (hopefully) funny jokes, and learning lots of new facts to bore... er... entertain your friends with.
You can play Trivia Fun against a Timer, or quiz in Zen mode for the times when you just want to chill out.
Do you want a hint about what I'm going to mention next? Yes, it's hints! Stumped by a trivia question? I suggest you take a hint and remove two of the possible quiz answers to make it a 50/50 chance - and those are great odds!
Want a fun character to use as your avatar? Who wouldn't?!? There's some fantastic characters to reflect the beautiful person, or werewolf, you are!
Here's the bullet points!

name: Break Everything: Park
summary: The game is a fun shooter made on Unreal 5. You need to use a toy rifle to shoot balls to break all the objects in the park.

name: BraverBots
summary: BraverBots is a turn-based strategy game like no other. Assemble a team from your fleet of Bots, battle and defeat opponents in short online matches, and become champion of the Galactic Bots League.

name: Breu: Shadow Hunt
summary: A thriller interactive-fiction audio game. Run from creatures in a grid based fashion style in this 'choose your own adventure' game. Embark on a treasure hunt to help Marco finding his missing grandfather.

name: Brain Tester: Mind trick quiz
summary:
This Game Is About Riddles and Mind Trick Questions .
Challenging Question that will trick your brain to get wrong answer.

Coming with 4(?) Choices of answers that will Help you beat the game

name: Brain Battle
summary:
Good old pen & paper game known from schooldays is now on mobile! That’s Brain Battle - Trivia and Word game.
Grab your knowledge of cars, animals, actors and actresses and many more categories and challenge up to three friends or random players to the showdown of brain power.

name: Brwanjeya
summary:
Brwanjeya: is a free-to-play mobile match-three puzzle game. Players compete to stay on the game board by swapping black and white pieces on the board to make a match of three points on the same straight line. It’s a challenging game that motivates you to compete with your competitors.
Take on this amazing adventure alone or play with friends to see who can get the top score!

name: Brazen Fruit
summary:
Let's go Brazen Fruit! Make combos by combining colorful fruits!
Start playing Brazen Fruit
This unique game is one of the most interesting mobile games of all time!
Match Fruits in this combo arcade game to progress to the next level.
Get that great feeling when your best combos rewarded with gold keys and other bonuses!
Take on this great game alone or play with friends to see who can finished all levels!
Brazen Fruit is completely free to play.
Get ready for a fun new adventures with Brazen Fruit!

name: Breakout 13: Fight
summary: Breakout is a narrative adventure game with interactive cinematic experience. It is about a group of misguided youths, who are sent to a correctional center and try to escape.

name: Brick Clear Storm
summary:
Brick Clear Storm is a casual game.
The rule is simple, tap the bricks they will be smashed if three or more.
Just click the chessboard to gain high score!

name: Bricks Breaker Challenge
summary: You are invited to the world of fantastic brick breaker! The game rule is simple and easy. Just break bricks with your ball!

name: Brightstone Mysteries: The Others
summary: A local toy-maker and all his factory workers mysteriously vanished on the same night. Uncover shocking secrets in this eerie hidden object puzzle adventure game!

name: Brick Breaker Star: Space King
summary: Brick Breaker game that everyone can enjoy. Enjoy various missions and addictively simple play control.

name: BrokenLore: Unfollow
summary: BrokenLore: Unfollow is a surreal horror game where you play as a victim of bullying, fighting terrifying monsters as you uncover a dark mystery in a thrilling journey of terror. It pushes you to the edge of your seat as you explore the dark impact of social media on mental health.

name: Broombot Battlegrounds
summary: Battle to the death as adorable household cleaning robots in this frantic physics-based arena combat game! Compete in 1-4 player cage matches with your friends (or enemies) to be the meanest clean-machine of them all!

name: Brick Breaker Hero
summary:
The classic brick breaker game with a new twist! Your new breakout addiction!
Can you be the villagers’ hero and break them out of the monsters’ stronghold?
Keep up with the bouncing ball and deflect it with your paddle in this classic breakout game!

name: Brink of Death
summary: Your goal is to defeat the Killer by destroying his inspired objects. The murderer will subject you to different tortures. Rescue your friends using secrecy and hiding. Eliminate the Killer by racing against the clock to find hidden items.

name: Broken Tails
summary: Uncover the dark secrets of an abandoned house as you search for your missing kittens in Broken Tails, a psychological horror exploration game. Use your stealth and wit to evade malevolent beings and unravel the disturbing story of animal neglect and other dark themes in this atmospheric experience

name: Brutal Strike
summary: Brutal Strike is a multiplayer shooter. Fight as two teams and show off your shooting skills to give your team the edge in combat.

name: Brxken Inside
summary: Shion's calm and measured life comes to an end when she meets Akiko. This encounter has the chance to change her life or plunge it further into the abyss of depression and hopelessness.

name: Broken System
summary: BrokenSystem - is a 2D shooter where you need to clear all enemies at all levels. Each of them is a potential enemy of all people. Avoid bullets and give a furious rebuff. Your skills will help you with this. Sleight of hand and good strategy are your best friends.

name: Brahman: The Gate of Salvation
summary: Quinn T. Cooper was sent to the island to repair the multi-dimensional gate and bring the spacetime rift under control. He has the key to the world's destiny in his hands. To stop an invasion and control the spacetime rip.

name: Breakout Force
summary: Breakout Force is a culmination of quirky block-breaking games greatly inspired by Nights into Dreams and like-minded games from the 90s. Rack up points, maximize chains all before the timer runs out. The game will put your tactical and twitch reflex skills to the test, all in strobing Arcady style.

name: Bryce Tiles
summary: A Manhattan/taxicab-geometric tile-based isometric puzzle strategy game featuring everyone's favorite 90's anti-hero, Bryce! You'll push boxes across tiles, sands, still waters, rapids, moving floors, ice and coals to move into position! Don't forget to redirect the lasers and evade those enemies!

name: Bremen Hot Strings
summary: Bremen Hot Strings is a graphic adventure that adapts the original Brothers Grimm fairy tale "Town Musicians of Bremen" within the context of 1930s Germany under the yoke of Nazism.

name: Bridge to Another World: Secrets of the Nutcracker
summary: Something is terribly wrong in the toy world, and only you can help!

name: Broken Note
summary: A big world RPG adventure puzzle game that uses electric guitar and music elements to fight and solve puzzles, you need to find meaning and hope with your guitar in the dilapidated end world.

name: Brutal TD
summary: Brutal TD is a minimalist retro-styled tower defense game. Unlike most tower defense games, Brutal TD has you in complete control of your tower, you can choose what enemies to fire at, which enemies you prioritize, and more. Each level gets more challenging and has different enemy types.

name: Breathless Winds
summary: After recovering from a painful incident, a closeted trans woman finds herself split between four possible paths - returning to sailing, becoming a healer, helping the resident witch, or joining a prince on a mysterious quest. A fantasy romance visual novel about love and self-discovery.

name: Brain Cell
summary: Brain Cell is a co-operative multiplayer adventure game. Play up to 4 players co-op to explore dungeons, complete puzzles, with twisting gravity physics. Explore huge worlds with friends. Work together to complete mind bending puzzles and defeat bosses.

name: Brickscapes: Bricks Breaker
summary: Relax your mind with Brick Breaker Game. Start the new adventure of a bricks game! it is simple to play and fun to keep challenging yourself with new bricks.

name: Brick Breaker Lab
summary: Save the laboratory from the Artificial Intelligence gone crazy. Break hazardous bricks and take back control of the lab in this breakout brick breaker game.

name: Brothel Simulator
summary: In Brothel Simulator you must master the art of pleasing your clients by teaching your ladies their desired fetishes and keeping track of your regular customers. Your goal is to earn enough money to purchase all of the sex scenes in the gallery.

name: Brix and Trix
summary: Brix and Trix is an addictive and engaging puzzle game with the goal of removing all blocks from the screen. The game is guaranteed to provide to you with hours of entertainment and increasing levels of difficulties.

name: Brain Damage
summary: Brain Damage is a dark, emotional journey in the mind of a serial killer that picks up a hitchhiker. Without revealing too much, memory, feedbacks, drilling, saws, acid are all in there, somewhere between a game and a movie all done in minimal monochrome pixel style graphics.

name: Brawlerz Zombies
summary:
Brawlerz Zombies is a fast paced augmented reality action-shooter where you drive, boost, shoot and splat waves of hilarious zombies. Upgrade your vehicles and your weapons and take on the zombie hoards.
Intuitive controls allow for epic twitch-shooting speeds and tightly controlled driving. Rush to protect the Great Driver hologram and summon air strikes from drones.

name: Brake Away
summary:
A casual racing game for speed lovers! How long can you keep your cars going without crashing?
Buckle up and get your fingers ready to control multiple cars that never stop! Tap on the cars to slow them down, don't let them crash, and win coins to unlock new features.

name: Brain Challenge 3: Think Again!
summary: A mobile puzzle game by Gameloft.

name: Bridge to Another World: Cursed Clouds
summary: Gather your courage for this mystical journey to a distant world!

name: Brickmasters
summary: A physics based brick building game

name: BRoS: Battle Royale of Survival
summary: Fight against other survivors and watch the time to escape from the island. Jump into the battle royale experience and try to survive. To increase your chance of survival, arm yourself and show no mercy. Chaos reigns on the island and only one survives or no one. Be a survivor!

name: Bring Me Down
summary: Balance the platform, collect bananas while avoiding rockets and mines, compete with your friends on Game Center, all in this fresh new arcade game.

name: Brain Memory: Premium Edition
summary:
Help your child harness the hidden potential of their mind. Use these colorfull cards to improve their memory skills.
Brain Memory improves on the classic formula of memory games. It lets you increase the difficulty level at your own pace, and customize challenges to one's taste.

name: Brick Crossy Road
summary:
Brick Crossy Road will take you back to the golden age of gaming.
All you need to do is to safely move the bit block waiting to cross the busy roads.
Watch out for retro cars, buses and trucks moving along busy retro highway. Just Kidding..We made everything in blocks..Retro style.
Cross the road when they pass and watch out for the next. This is very reflexive and
brain rattling as you proceed further.

name: Break Ultimate
summary:
Break ultimate is unique brick breaker style game, where you knock out the color blocks and collect the dead blocks.
There are mixture of power-ups that will increase, shoot, add extra balls, zap blocks and many more to help complete the levels.
There are also power-ups that will slow down the paddle/Balls, shrink paddle, gravity, invert paddle directions and many more try to avoid those.

name: Brave the Dungeon
summary: Brave the Dungeon is a thrilling and immersive multiplayer open-world game that takes you on an epic journey to fight against the daemonic invasion threatening the archipelago.

name: Brain Hole Girls
summary: Can a perfect body and a smart brain coexist?

name: Brawlhalla: All Legends Pack
summary: The All Legends Pack immediately unlocks all current Legends and every Legend we add in the future. Everything in the “Legends” tab in the in-game store would be yours to have. Forever. Note that this doesn’t unlock Crossovers.

name: Brageskålen
summary: Travel to Veøya in the Viking Age and solve a dangerous mystery with cunning and song!

name: Broken Spectre
summary: Broken Spectre is a cosmic horror narrative adventure game developed in collaboration with the makers of The Blair Witch Project. A cryptic message left by her father takes Casey back to the abandoned trails of Coldblood Mountain, a remote wilderness that has haunted her family for generations. In addition to its unique, macabre visual style, Broken Spectre takes advantage of the Meta Quest 2’s immersive hand-tracking controls to bring unparalleled realism to the game’s gruesome body horror elements.

name: Bravely Second: The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers
summary: Bravely Second: The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers is a pre-launch prelude to the Bravely Second: End Layer and released as a demo in the eShop. In contrast to the full game, the demo features a unique storyline and simplified versions of some gameplay elements. The prelude focuses on the Three Cavaliers – Yew Geneolgia, Janne Angard, and Nikolai Nikolanikov.

name: Brick Rage
summary:
Harness your rage and your focus to defeat this non-stop, addictive and challenge game.
Swipe to direct the missing bricks into place,column by column, demolishing rows before the wall crashes down on you.

name: Breakup Squad
summary: A fast and asymmetrical team-based game for five players!

name: Brain Memory: Definitive Edition
summary: Brain Memory improves on the classic formula of memory games. It lets you increase the difficulty level at your own pace, and customize challenges to one's taste.

name: Breath of the Wild Multiplayer
summary:
An online multiplayer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
Its development started due to the streamer PointCrow offering U$10,000 for a modder to make an online multiplayer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild with some conditions, like being the first to stream and that the project needed to be finished before the release of the sequel (Tears of the Kingdom, known as Breath of the Wild 2 at that time).
Breath of the Wild Multiplayer Team, lead by modder AlexMangue, took on the challenge and released the mod in April 4th, 2023.
Since then, PointCrow started streaming the mod and recording videos of it, but Nintendo decided to take down his videos. The mod is currently unavailable for download and unsupported, as a prevention from legal actions by Nintendo.
developers: Breath of the Wild Multiplayer Team
publishers: Breath of the Wild Multiplayer Team

name: Brain Damage
summary: Challenge your skills and push your limits in Brain Damage, the intense 2D action roguelite shooter with wave-based gameplay. With each upgrade, brain damage increases, making the game more challenging as you progress. Push the game to its limits. Can you break the game before it breaks you?

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Multiplayer Mode
summary: This DLC features an exciting local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family.

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Multiplayer Edition
summary: This bundle includes base game and Multiplayer Mode DLC.

name: Bravehood
summary: Bravehood is a PvEvP dungeon crawler with co-op features. Form up your team and fight against the creatures and other teams for glory and treasure. Build your knight to become the best in Kingdom of Hardingham through other players.

name: Brasil Simuleitor
summary: Simple game based on the life of the Brazilian

name: Broom Royale
summary: Broom Royale is a first-person multiplayer game where you fly on a broom and cast spells. Enchant your opponents before they do it to you.

name: Brutalism22
summary: This is a retro horror game about the war in Ukraine and brutalist architecture in Eastern Europe.

name: Brown Bob
summary: Join Brown Bob in his thrilling adventure and help him save his beloved pet!

name: Brothel Simulator II
summary: Brothel Simulator II is a simulation game in which you manage your own brothel. Employ girls, keep track of their needs, level up their skills, keep the bar well stocked and your clients will be back again and again.

name: Brie Parmesan Mysteries
summary: Brie Parmesan, master detective is a stealthy rat navigating the criminal underworld of Chicatgo in search of cheese and collecting evidence to solve cases and bring the Cat Meofia to justice.

name: Broken Soul
summary: Broken soul is a personal hell of a lost person, which makes Alex meet his own demons. Should he lose to his fears or he must struggle and fight off the things his own mind hides?

name: Breach in Space
summary: Breach in Space is a 2D shooting game with challenging combat and platforming. Find a way back to home galaxy through 4 different planets.

name: Brewess
summary: Brewess is a narrative adventure game about crafting ales and building friendships in Early Modern East Anglia. The region is plagued with power struggles that you must navigate as a brewer, using your dry wit and natural charm to keep your business open and your purses full.

name: Brave Heart
summary: Somewhat a clone of the original Mario Bros., though the player must climb ladders to reach higher platforms instead of jumping.

name: Brains Diamonds
summary: Navigate the cube to collect all of the coins and land in the star tile.

name: Brain Memory: Complete Edition
summary:
Help your child harness the hidden potential of their mind. Use these colorfull cards to improve their memory skills.
Brain Memory improves on the classic formula of memory games. It lets you increase the difficulty level at your own pace, and customize challenges to one's taste.

Our brains are the most important tools of the XXI century. Do your child a favor, and give thema gift that will help them reach their full potential.

Let them become masters of their own minds with the Figures Pack!

name: Brave Adventurer
summary: Brave Adventurer - The story of a vagabond who travels through Middle-earth and is the victim of an attack by bandits, resulting in serious injury. You enter the world of demons through the use of dark magic.

name: Breaker Fun: Rescue Adventure
summary: Classic bricks and balls free puzzle games meet rescue adventure! Aim and crush all the bricks and obstacles to brick out the trap and save the man!

name: Brain Games
summary: A series of very basic, semi-educational titles, which feature what appears to be Nature Clan in them (albeit a fairly loose adaption). Titles include: Rudder (pictured), Addition, Build Pillars, Counting, Crystals, Fruit Logic, Numbers, and Salver Balance.

name: Bridgebourn
summary: Explore a hand-painted dynamic open world in this immersive ARPG. Create custom spells and trigger countless reactions. Plunder treasure and secrets with your party of adventurers. Upgrade your party with magic loot. Fight what lurks in the depths of dungeons. Discover mysteries of the Fadelands.

name: Brave Bubble Heart
summary: In Brave Bubble Heart, you'll face strange creatures and solve puzzles while saving as many souls as you can that are lost in the abyss. Your life is your ammunition. Do not die!

name: Brain Show
summary: Compete with your friends in brand new quiz game. Take part in crazy TV Show. Dynamite explosions, sobbing mates, ruined friendships! Sounds like fun? It will be – with Brain Show!

name: Bright Tracer
summary: Bright Tracer is a high-speed running game, dash through a cyberspace world being invaded by a virus. You stylishly advance through the stages stylishly using various actions such as wall-run and wire-hook. Run, jump, dodge enemies and obstacles through the world to get to the virus's boss.

name: Brick Exorcist
summary: "Brick Exorcist" is a casual bishojo brick break game! You accidentally crossed into another world and became an exorcist. With the help of the goddess, you exorcised the beautiful girl who was possessed by the devil!

name: Bricks Crusher Breaker Ball
summary: Break all the bricks in this awesome arcade!

name: BrasFoot 2003
summary: BrasFoot 2003 is the first iteration of the soccer management simulator focused on Brazilian teams where you can buy and view players from other teams at any time during the game, manually select players for each match, change the ticket prices of the game at any time, and much more.

name: Bratz: Flaunt Your Fashion - Girls Nite Out Fashion Pack
summary: Expand Bratz Magazine by reporting on your recent travels with a world-renowned designer and rock new looks from the Girls Nite Out collection.

name: Brain Memory: Legendary Edition
summary:
Help your child harness the hidden potential of their mind. Use these colorfull cards to improve their memory skills.
Brain Memory improves on the classic formula of memory games. It lets you increase the difficulty level at your own pace, and customize challenges to one's taste.

Our brains are the most important tools of the XXI century. Do your child a favor, and give thema gift that will help them reach their full potential.

name: Broken Minds
summary: Broken minds is a CASUAL TURN COMBAT RPG, with a rich lore, where you control a 13 year old boy, in a mission to overcome his trauma

name: Bread or Dead
summary: Playing as a peanut butter and jelly-obsessed professional exterminator, you travel across the world taking care of nasty undead infestations. Make some serious cash to reach your goal of eating as many peanut butter and jelly sandwiches as possible, and down it all with a glass of chocolate milk.

name: Broken Colors
summary:
Eventually, we're all just gonna break.

You are a cashier at a convenience store, depressed and lonely with your mundane life, hoping for a bit of excitement. One day you meet a peculiar stranger who's sweet and shy at first, but one kind gesture is all it takes to make him stalk admire you a bit too much and be a danger to everyone else around you. Be careful how you treat him and others, for pain and death will follow you like a shadow. But perhaps fate has other plans for you...

name: Brainroll
summary: Embark on a mind-bending adventure as Brainroll! Solve challenging puzzles in this sokoban-style game by moving brain blocks while sliding on ice. Relax in Brainroll's world, where clever thinking is the key to success. Get ready to roll your way to victory in this puzzle-packed sliding experience!

name: Brothers in Hell
summary: After you die, Death gives you the chance to come back to the world of the living to fulfill your deepest desire. Take the chance. Get back on your feet, and claim your revenge in this stealth action-adventure game

name: Brain Rot Excellence
summary: Brain Rot Excellence is a Yume Nikki fan game mainly inspired by Broken Bottles and Space Funeral. You follow Brianna Ruth as she explores her mind while in a drug induced coma, inside her she meet Nocebo, a strangely self aware creature who latches unto her and aids her in combat. To be able to wake up from your coma you have to figure out what happened to you and hopefully regain control. The game is exploration based with a little bit of combat thrown in.

name: Break Stuff VR
summary:
Break Stuff in VR!! Smash for cash as a game show contestant. Throw and bash your way to victory!

Throw virtual objects in the visually stunning and exciting stages! Demolish an office construction site. Wreck a country parking lot. Crash apart a carnival. Shatter a china shop.

Swing baseball bats and sticks to break cool things! Bash away at fax machines and piñatas. Crush a showcase of expensive objects. Smash a fully destructible car!!

Have fun destroying virtual objects without the real clean up or consequences!
All ages and experiences levels. Easy to play, difficult to master.
Fun for everyone!

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Co-op Edition
summary:
It's almost time for breakfast! Go and prove that your breakfast bar deserves its fame!
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your own breakfast kitchen?
In Breakfast Bar Tycoon, you'll learn that it's no easy task!
You will take on the role of a breakfast bar manager and try your best to serve the hordes of hungry customers as quickly as possible.
Take orders, prepare dishes and fight for tips!

name: Bruxólico
summary: Bruxólico is a new action platformer for the ZX Spectrum where you will hear/play/read the story of the Ghost-Ox, the little creature that came out from a doomed bottomless well, along with other unbelievable witchlish beings, fruits of our own ills and maledictions.

name: Bruce Campbell vs Ganon
summary: Bruce Campbell vs Ganon is a mod for The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past. It contains new dungeons, new puzzles, and harder bosses

name: Breezy
summary: It's like golf, but you control the wind. Harness the breeze to platform through a variety of colorful and wacky courses. Collect Golden Tees to unlock new courses and characters. Conquer holes with random modifiers in Remix Rush.

name: Breach
summary: Challenge your friends or other players in the world in a dynamic duel based on melee weapons. Demonstrate liveliness and strategy to defeat your opponent. Impose your style of play and show others that you are the best.

name: Breach: Chicago War Zone
summary: Survive the bloody war between The Archangels, The Outfit, and The Cartels. Roll the dice—and face the consequences of your actions!

name: Broadway Legend Ellena
summary: Broadway Legend Ellena is a rhythm game released in the Disc Station magazine for PC-98 computers in 1994. The title character, Ellena Stevens, would later cameo in Puyo Puyo DA! for the Sega Dreamcast.

name: Break the Balloons: Ghost Town
summary:
Ghost Town is a perfect kingdom for all kind of fears and horrors until...
The Cats came. And they can detect Ghosts, disturb them, hunt them...
You, the new Ghost hero in Town, lead us to destroy all Cat's balloons to drop them, bring back fear to the land!

name: Brothers: Clash of Fighters
summary:
Brothers: Clash of Fighters is the official game of the Brothers Bollywood movie starring Akshay Kumar and Sidharth Malhotra. It is an arcade street fighting game featuring one-on-one close combat fight style with 3D animated life like characters of Akshay and Sidharth as well as a roster of international fighters.
Compete as David or Monty in arcade mode and fight the greats of MMA wrestling over 3 rounds in one killer battle for supremacy. If you’re in it for the long run, then compete in the tournament mode where each fight is more difficult than the next and the stakes are higher than ever. Win every match or face a disgraceful knockout in this war of the legends.

name: Broken Picture Telephone
summary: Broken Picture Telephone, sometimes abbreviated BPT, was a collaborative multiplayer online drawing and writing game invented in 2007, based on the pen-and-paper game Telephone Pictionary.

name: Breathedge 2
summary: Sent on a reckless mission, you find yourself in outer space filled with numerous dangers and things to explore. Build, craft, manage your crew, look after the chicken, and defeat the evil space corporation in this new breathtaking survival game.

name: Break Them All
summary: The game type is A Roguelite barrage shooting game, Choose different upgrades after each level, and each upgrade can be integrated to form a unique gameplay. Every game is a brand-new experience. After each customs clearance, the difficulty increases and the playability is enhanced.

name: Breaking Friendships
summary: A relaxing social game for two people. Use the knowledge about your friend to generate electricity for time-traveling residents.

name: Bride of the Nightmare
summary: A fantasy that begins when the moon hides in a dream.

name: BroChicken
summary: BroChicken is a light Rouge Like 3D game created by Unreal Engine. Players can play various roles, get gold coins, various weapons and props in battle, choose to improve their capability. Weapons can be synthesized into super weapons, which unlock cool full-screen effect and AOE attack effects.

name: Bright Reappear
summary:
On the continent of Oslo, humans and creatures live peaceful and tranquil lives. Peace has lasted for thousands of years here. Immersed in peace, humans and creatures gradually forget the existence of darkness. And darkness quietly spreads.
The dark queen, once defeated by humans, has returned, leading a large army of darkness from the depths of hell to reappear in the world. The even more powerful darkness is invincible, and the northern human army has already been defeated, with the city defense lost. The dark army has moved south and is about to occupy the entire Oslo continent.
The belated humans and creatures rise up to fight back, but is there still a chance? Currently, the Oslo continent has been shrouded in darkness. Will light ever return?
This is a role-playing (RPG) game. As a player, you play as a hero fighting for the light of the Oslo continent. Okay! This is a classic story of a hero saving the world. But everyone has a dream of becoming a hero in their heart, and I hope you can experience it here.
Let's fight for the light together!

name: Brave Little Beasties
summary: Raise your elemental beasties to become the strongest fighter in the arena. Collect them in wild areas and train them to fight in battles against other players. Crossbreed them to change their element. Sell beasties that you no longer need to other players and try to complete your beastie collection.

name: Bratavism
summary: A solitary dolphin creature creates an abstract painting by throwing a tantrum!

name: Bride of the Twilight
summary: A mobile otome game.

name: Bride of the Full Moon
summary: The fantasy that begins when the full moon RISES.

name: Bruxa
summary: Candy world, book world, fantasy world...

name: Bricks of Rome
summary:
Rome was not built in a single day, that's for sure. It took many years and much effort to become the empire that we all know. Grab your sword and shield and put a small stone to build this empire.
The game "Bricks of Rome" is a mixture of arcade and strategy games. Move the plate in the bottom of the screen with your finger and chip the ball that is coming towards you and return it to the enemy ranks that consists of a series of blocks and other objects. The game's story takes place between 300 BC to 100 BC in the Mediterranean area and you can choose from a variety of states and nations of the era such as the Romans, the Kingdom of Macedonia, the Greek city-states, the Gallic tribes, the Carthaginians, the Epirus, the Seleucids, the Ptolemies, the Germanic tribes, the British tribes or the Kingdom of Pergamon. Through separate campaigns you will lead your people to victory and you will become the Supreme Ruler in the Mediterranean Sea. To achieve this, you will need to hire mercenaries or to upgrade your weapons and armor of your soldiers or build forts and palisades.

name: Brulo's Ballble Teafense!
summary:
You work the 24/7 at your own bar. Between dealing with rabid rodents and wild customers, you have your hands full. Today seems to be your unlucky day.

The Ballbusters have planned their biggest raid yet, and every hour seems to be rush hour! It's up to you to take care of these pests... well, and the moles too.

name: Brick Dungeon
summary: Brick Dungeon Classic brick game enriched by RPG elements!

name: Brick Breaker Dungeon
summary: Brick Breaker Dungeon is a brick breaker pinball arcade game. To play it you should bounce balls from walls and destroy magic blocks that descend every turn. Different blocks have unique properties that can be used against them. Choose the right angle to fire pinballs, use the best spells and strike evil blocks to destroy them and get a reward!

name: Break Point
summary: Welcome to Break Point, a 9-map Doom II UDMF episode featuring colorful 3D environments from some of the best and brightest of modern GZDoom mappers.

name: Breathe
summary:
Birds singing, trees swaying in the wind, the warmth of the sun in your skin. Just stop, and... breathe.

Created for A Game By Its Cover 2022 based on nbmach1ne's Famicase. Also submitted to Bird Jam and Mushroom Jam.

name: Brawl Tactics: Origins
summary: Brawl Tactics: Origins fuses deck-building roguelikes and the tactics RPG genre like never before - lead your units, collect valuable trinkets and cast powerful spells to ensure victory!

name: Bronzebeard's Tavern
summary: A multiplayer tavern management game.

name: Breaking Survivors
summary: Brick-breaking gameplay meets Survivors-like mechanics. Use your balls to destroy bricks, level up and pick upgrades to hold your ground against waves of incoming bricks and try to high score in this roguelite brick breaking game.

name: Broken Hearts Island
summary: Broken Hearts Island, a visual novel in the fantasy genre, tells the story of the adventures of a young oceanologist on a mysterious island.

name: Brotato + Space Gladiators Bundle
summary:
Enjoy two games from Blobfish with this bundle!

Brotato is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you play a potato wielding up to 6 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of aliens. Choose from a variety of traits and items to create unique builds and survive until help arrives.

Ever dreamt of being a space potato? Now’s your chance! Space Gladiators is a 2D hand-drawn roguelite platformer following a bunch of captives fighting their way out of a planet prison. Defeat hordes of aliens in the gladiatorial arenas and earn your freedom!

name: Brain On: Dot Physics
summary: Get your Brain On and work out the physics puzzles

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Couch Co-op Edition
summary:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #2 and Multiplayer Mode with:

• 45 new levels to explore
• 8 new Achievements to complete
• local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family.

name: Bridge Hunter
summary: Greetings, pilot. Get ready to deploy your drone for the mission at hand! Your objective is to prevent the enemy from using a vital bridge. You have the freedom to try out various tactics and abilities in a fully destructible environment. Your role is crucial!

name: Bring The Chickens Home
summary: Find your lost chickens and bring em home in this casual action isometric 3d platformer. Compete against other players best times around the world. Work and fight together in local co-op. Save as many chickens and survive in endless mode.

name: Broforce: Forever
summary: The final update offers an improved and expanded campaign with new unlocks, along with six new ultra patriotic bros, four new new democracy-spreading challenge levels, and the ultimate expression of military might – bug fixes!

name: Brave Bow Archer: Princess Rescue Simulator!
summary: The princess is in danger! Archer, shoot the rope and save the princess! Demonstrate your accuracy skills and complete the puzzle with real physics!

name: Brood of Hatred
summary: For reasons unknown you wake up in a strange place. Another world. A world populated by evil. The brood of hatred! And once again you really have no other choice...no other choice than grabbing a nearby shotgun and start blasting your way...home?

name: BrainTaire
summary:
There is no way to find most talented person in the world! One thing that Google can not help you search!
It will be interesting to find most talented person by country/year/city/schools.
Only the most talented person in the world will be able to beat all 6 levels of this game! Is that you?

name: Bridge Crossing
summary: In a troubled period of war, help the shepherd to cross the bridge in search of the lost sheep.

name: Brutal Complex
summary:
One summer day, a girl realizes the way to the dream world, a path of blood leading to a white space. What kind of world awaits beyond that? Brutal Complex has a cute, surreal, and aesthetic atmosphere.

As of July 22, 2024, the title has been put on indefinite hiatus.

name: Broken Sword: Parzival’s Stone
summary: George and Nico uncover another ancient mystery to get involved with as series prepares for 6th entry.

name: Broken Sword: Shadow of the Templars Reforged
summary: The classic multi-award winning adventure "Broken Sword - the Shadow of the Templars" returns with glorious 4K visuals and iconic remastered audio, pitching intrepid American George Stobbart and fearless journalist Nico Collard into a journey of perilous adventures and ancient conspiracies.

name: Breath of Space
summary: Join Uzay on a rescue mission in Breath of Space, a breathtaking third-person shooter rogue-lite/roguelike. Fight your way through an invaded space facility alongside your companion droid, who carries your life essence. Choose to risk your droid to help you or face even greater challenges alone.

name: Brocante Game: Blister Hunter
summary: Brocante Game: Blister Hunter is a game based on the first two season of the french youtube serie Brocante Game. it's the first opus of a diptych followed by Brocante Game: Gabriel's Odyssey (2018).

name: Brood Ma: Dadda
summary: Manipulate the limbs of a fragile automaton to shape an immense dynamic noise score.

name: Brotherhood of Ruin: The Lost Temple
summary: A Large single map for DOOM2, taking place in an ancient temple complex swarming with hellspawn. Occasional switchhunt might occur as the map isn't very linear. Be warned and pay attention to the surroundings of the map.

name: Bright Day
summary: You awaken to a bright and sunny day. Wanting to go out and enjoy the beauty of the sun, you find that mysteriously, you can't leave. The doors are locked. No one is home. Strange noises can be heard behind your shoulder. Can you survive the nightmare slowly forming around you?

name: Breaking Box: Walk
summary: A physics puzzle game that can only walk!

name: Brick Breaker
summary: Brick Breaker is a video game developed by Canadian Developer Ali Asaria that came preloaded on certain BlackBerry devices and is now available on the iOS App Store.

name: Brimstone
summary: Sensible Software is a studio embedded in gaming history for many reasons outside of the admittedly immortal Sensible Soccer. Along with the Canon Fodder games – the destructive sibling of Sensible's popular football sim – the company's commitment to the 16-bit Amiga proved that, sometimes, you can achieve impossibly addictive gaming perfection even with the most cartoon-like of visuals. Make a game addictive, and if it's being played by enough people, you've succeeded – and the fame of Sensible's output during the '90s suggests that it was something of a triumph.

name: Brownie's Adventure
summary: A fantasy point and click adventure in traditional 1990s style. Dark humour, player choices that have impact on your outcome and hours of daft shenanigans.

name: BrazSonic 20XX
summary: BrazSonic 20XX is a reboot of the BrazSonic series set in 20XX's Brazil, where the congressman Dr. Corruptnik, who dreams of being President of the country, seeks the Corruption Emeralds to make it true. However, his ambition implies chaos and destruction to the lands and citizens. Then the hero BrazSonic will come into the scene to stop him!

name: Break Arts III
summary: Freely customize your own robots to win high-speed matches! With the brand new Co-op Mode and Diorama Mode, this game is a fresh new addition to the series.

name: Broken Life
summary: BROKEN LIFE is an atmospheric, fully voiced point-and-click adventure set in a war-torn world. Follow Leo, a former soldier, as he returns to his hometown to uncover the fate of his family, restore his home, and confront the dark secrets hidden within.

name: Brews & Bastards
summary: Brews & Bastards is a chaotic co-op dungeon crawler for 1-4 players, overflowing with action-packed combat, magical brews and outlandish tavern games. Select from a group of distinct heroes and blast your way through hordes of drunken demons in search of the stolen Brew Stone.

name: Bright Side: Riddles & Puzzles
summary: Who is lying? Who will survive? Which way is safe? Watch unusual stories and solve tricky riddles with your friends or solo!

name: Breath of the Depth
summary: The crew of Project Flounder is lost in a mysterious shipwreck, and only L survives. When he escapes the submarine, he finds himself in a mysterious and lost country. It was full of never-seen sights, ancient ruins and unknown artifacts, and it made him want to explore every corner, every secret.

name: Bruteforce: Survivors
summary: Bruteforce: Survivors is a dark techno-fantasy top-down ARPG where players combat hordes of foes, exploring diverse biomes. Face intense challenges, risk losing treasures upon death, but emerge victorious to reap immense rewards.

name: Brazen Blaze
summary:
Brazen Blaze is a 3v3 Smack & Shoot VR Action game with emphasis on close quarter melee combat!
Choose from a range of unique runners each equipped with individual skills meant to destroy whatever blocks your path to sure victory!

name: Brick on the Head
summary: As a manager of an hospital near bankrupt, you find that a brick on the head will give you patients. Also play on Hospital Mode where you can build your own hospital, take care of patients, protect him with security guards...

name: Brain Quiz
summary: Brain Quiz crazy general quiz game... Challenge your brain, and your culture

name: Brain Memory: Game of the Year Edition
Brawlers
summary: One of the top Web3 fighting games, developed by Tyranno Studios! A rowdy collision of strategy and suplexes, designed by the Magic: The Gathering mastermind.

name: Bring Me Home
summary: Cute game about little octopus Blubi. You need to help him to get in his shell till the time is over.

name: Bro Falls Deluxe
summary: Bro Falls is an asymmetric massively multiplayer party game with chaotic elements, trap activations, and big Falls.

name: Break the Loop
summary: Break the Loop is a turn-based Rogue-like RPG. Compose your team and create a timeline by selecting the events you'll go through. Each decision will bring you one step closer to the ultimate threat, but will you have accumulated enough power to stop the apocalypse?

name: BraceUp VR
summary: BraceUp VR is a ultimate Play & Train game! Engage in thrilling break activities fused with home fitness. Master modes, boost stamina, conquer environments, and dominate in multiplayer battles. Become a Hero, tailor your challenge. Experience fun, competition, and immersion in this VR game!

name: Brain Escape
summary: You are an experimental brain ball that uses speed, agility and smarts to complete your mission…..all while being chased by a horde of hungry zombies.

name: Brewing Haus
summary: Brew your legacy and explore an inviting world as you create and expand your business. Embark on a serene beer brewing journey in this relaxing simulation game. Discover new recipes, expand, and master the art of brewing.

name: Breed Master
summary: Color-matching puzzle game with a monster raising mechanic.

name: BREAKERS: Unlock the World
summary: Breakers: Unlock the World is an animation RPG in development for PC and smartphone at Vic Game Studios. It is an all-new, original title that depicts the story of the journey to the “Library of God” at the farthest end of the earth where all knowledge of the world is accumulated. The journey of the characters, brought to life through cel-shaded rendering, will invite you to a gameplay experience that feels like playing an anime.

name: Brawl Royale
summary:
A traditional reflex-testing game, with very violent animations!
Bash space to play.

name: Break the Glass Cup: Breaking Physics Puzzle
summary: A classic mindfulness and accuracy puzzle based on real physics - throw the ball and break all the glass cups!

name: Bravo Music: Chou Meikyokuban
summary:
One of three Japan-exclusive sequels to Bravo Music/Mad Maestro!
Bravo Music - Chou Meikyokuban: Your goal is to play four beautiful songs for the Martians who have already left Mars and are on their way to Earth! They will arrive in one week's time, so you have seven days to play four beautiful songs - even if you screw up the song, it counts as a day, so do your best!

In Child Mode you can choose from six planets, each leading to a different song.

name: Brico Utile
summary: Brico Useful on DS can learn to do DIY in a fun way using 28 cards. Different themes are evoked: laying on the floor, wall and ceiling installation, structural work, painting, decoration ... To complete the whole, photos are proposed, as well as a calculator, tips, mini-games and quiz.

name: Broad Sword
summary:
Broad Sword is a formation based third-person tactical hack and slash game where you lead formations of troops to face off against a variety of factions in a fantasy realm. Engage in class-based combat as you defeat your foes in conquest, siege and campaign modes.

Fight from a ground level view of large fantasy battles, command your formation of troops, and lead your army through hack-and-slash encounters to claim ultimate victory! Go head to head in objective based conquest mode. Test your defensive skills in a wave based survival mode, or employ grand strategy in a campaign mode. Varied troop types offer distinct fighting styles and weapons, allowing for diverse playstyles and tactics. Will you anchor a battle line with spearmen, shatter defenses with mighty great swords, or rain arrows upon your enemies?

name: Brett Hull NHL Hockey
summary: Brett Hull NHL Hockey is an unfinished game for the Atari Jaguar. A beta build of the cartridge version of Brett Hull NHL Hockey was released by B&C Computervisions on January 9, 2004 for US$50. Brett Hull NHL Hockey is a ice hockey game that is played from a vertical perspective in a two-dimensional environment with sprites. Most of the rules from the sport are present in the title, though they can be disabled from the menu and in-game options. Some of the gameplay options found within the game include an exhibition match, regular season and playoff competitions, among other modes of play. The announcer, Al Michaels, makes commentary during gameplay and announces Brett Hull by name but other players are only called by their respective jersey number due to the lack of the NHL license, while his commentaries can also be turned off on the options menu. Season progress is only kept via password and there is also a two-player option for every mode.

name: Bratz: Flaunt Your Fashion - Complete Edition
summary: Bratz: Flaunt Your Fashion - Complete Edition offers a thrilling fashion adventure! Customize your favorite Bratz character, explore Stilesville and beyond. Complete quests, play bratitude-filled minigames, and chase the most significant stories while creating the ultimate fashion magazine. Includes Girls Nite Out and Pretty ‘N' Punk Fashion Packs.

name: Brush Burial
summary:
Brush Burial is a lo-fidelity First Person Snatcher.

You play as Fennel, a knife-wielding swamp devil with an eye for gold and a penchant for violence. Use your tail to toy with your prey: grab and fling objects, climb impossible heights, and knock your enemies off balance.

name: Brumal Quest
summary: Large snowy medieval village, using Daikatana and Hexen2 textures, and coming with snow-themed monster skins.

name: Breaking Box: Rush!
summary: A physics puzzle game that can only rush.

name: Brick Red
summary: Medium-sized terracotta/red brick castle based on the Progs_dump mod (included). Comes with a custom skybox and a few new sounds/models. The map and QC sources are included.

name: Breakfast at Twilight
summary: A knave-textured castle built upon scraps by Kell and Drew and the author's speedmap from SM93.

name: Bridges & Towers
summary: Large interconnected Metal level.

name: Brainwash Facility
summary: Duke after travelling lots of miles finally cached a bus. A bus, which took to a small, suspicious village. A village with big psychiatric hospital at the center. It looked evil at very beginning of Duke's adventure. It indeed was...

name: Bruise Mining Company
summary: The sequel to Ablaze, Bruise Mining Company is another fast paced romp through alien infested installation. This time they've taken over a uranium mining operation and as usual it's your job to flush 'em out.

name: Brooks in Wild West
summary: In this game will find diverse adventures with beautiful girls, fun times in the Saloon and lots of gunfights.

name: Brick Buddies
summary: Duo-crane control in a goofy couch co-op challenge! It's a race against time and woolly obstacles. Grab a buddy, stack sky-high, rack up points, and beware of those sheep!

name: Broadsword: Warlord Edition
summary: Broadsword: Warlord Edition is a turn-based tactical strategy game set to historical events of medieval conflict. Assemble your armies and put your tactics to the test, in Broadsword: Warlord Edition.

name: Brave and Desire
summary: Brave and Desire is a party battle roguelite RPG with a structure and events that change every time you start! Advance through the dungeon using a route selection system and aim to step through the innermost part of the dungeon!

name: Bride into the Cave
summary: Myth lingers in a tranquil and remote ancient town in China. In one telling, once a beautiful maiden is chosen by the cave deity, her soul disappears from the mortal realm. A minority girl called Miao Fei embarks on her journey to uncover the truth behind the legend, and rescue herself, perhap.

name: Brickhaven
summary: Create your gang from nothing. Start off with just yourself and take it from a single member to a sprawling criminal empire. Extort businesses, deal drugs, sell guns, and much more. Customize your gang to partake in whatever crimes you want them to. What kind of boss will you be?

name: BrickBounce
summary: Hit the right button corrrectly when the ball is upcoming to the brick , play the music with your keyboard.

name: Breadman
summary: Breadman is a 2D single-player action adventure game featuring both top-down and side-scrolling gameplay. Explore a vast valley, conquer challenging dungeons and solve the mystery of the ancient stone tablet!

name: Brain Champ
summary: Brain Champ is a brain training game with single and daily exercises, which test four areas of mental computation: Visual, Memory, Calculation, and Logic over a total of 16 exercises and 3 increasing difficulties of Junior, Master, and Genius.

name: Brawlberry
summary: Battle the fruit guardians as you hack and slash through the fruit scape in this coop rogue-like dungeon crawler.

name: Brasil Fusion
summary: Brasil Fusion is a free-to-play game with different game modes. Championships, disputes with friends, or the famous Battle Royale will show who are the best favela players in the world.

name: Brutalist Jam 2
summary: Over three and a half weeks, mappers created maps loosely centered around the Brutalism architectural movement. From concrete hellscapes to brutal liminal voids, imaginations and creativity ran wild in this jam, and created some truly stunning experiences! Built in the gameplay mod Copper (included), the pack includes 30 levels lovingly crafted by mappers both new and veteran, many maps created by first time mappers.

name: Brawlhalla: BCX 2023 Pack
summary:
The BCX 2023 Pack is DLC for the game Brawlhalla. It contains exclusive items meant to commemorate the 2023 Brawlhalla World Championship.

This pack included:
- Mammoth Gentle-fan Sidekick
- BCX 2023 Avatar
- 300 Mammoth Coins

This pack was delisted May 8th 2024.

name: Brain Hotel: Remodeled
summary:
A comic book-inspired point-and-click adventure game. You play as delivery man, Ed Arnold, who has the misfortune of delivering a package to the Brain Hotel on the eve of their annual super-villain convention.

Brain Hotel: Remodeled is a complete remake of the original 2004 Flash-based game, updated to take advantage of modern technology.

name: Brazil Fencing Club VR
summary: The Brazil Fencing Club has nine world-class foil fencers ready to challenge you. Test your fencing skill and see if it holds up against these wacky fencers. Use actual real world fencing skills in a virtual reality game that closely simulates actual real world foil fencing.

name: Brotherhood
summary: An old-school shooter inspired by Wolfenstein 3D. You are one of the prisoners of an ancient prison. There is no one to help you. You only have yourself to rely on. Your shotgun. Against hordes of enemies. Animal rage and the desire to kill. Destroy Them All!

name: Bragnarok
summary: Dance in the spotlight and push others out of it!

name: Bromine

name: Brain Overload: Calculate
summary: A computing training game where you get shot when you open the game. Train yourself, challenge the game producer, and exercise your brain!

name: Bring Me that Shawarma
summary: A visual novel about shawarma, consisting of multiple episodes.

name: Bravest Chicken
summary: Minimalist precision platformer starring a cute chicken. Flap your wings, avoid obstacles, get to the top of the tower and become Bravest Chicken!

name: Breath of Fire
summary: An enhanced port for the Game Boy Advance handheld system with new save features and minor graphical enhancements, with the English version being released in Europe for the first time.

name: Breath of Fire II
summary:
Breath of Fire II is a role playing game. The majority of game is played from a top-down map, however battles are seen from an isometric view. Ryu will form parties from among 8 other characters, each with their own set of skills and powers that will help him discover the truth behind the mystery.

In the GBA version, you can use a link-cable to link to friends and exchange weapons and items to defeat the higher evils. And with the inclusion of the community system, you can build and maintain your own city while you are fed up of exploring.

name: Brawlygon

Simple controls make it easy to learn, with plenty of tools to play around with for those who want more depth! Also introducing “Piercing” attacks, to shake up the genre, by dealing higher damage on blocking opponents compared landing a clean hit!

name: Brawl.io 2

name: BreadAttack
summary: You know what’s cool? A duck! You know what’s even cooler? A duck with a gun rescuing his home and family!

name: Brox

name: Bright Oak
summary: Bright Oak is a heavily character-driven visual novel with elements of science fiction. Discover the tragic secrets behind Bright Oak’s preternatural dilemma; find friendship, or possibly love; save the town and make your way home--and if at first you don’t succeed, try, try again!

name: Brutalistick VR

name: Breaking Bad DS

name: Breekha

name: Brinemegeddon

Plan your attack carefully, use the capabilities of several types of zombies and strive to defeat all of humanity.

On the crucial day of New Year's Break of the Fifth, Tang Ge, an Embroidered Uniform Guard captain, becomes entangled in a mysterious case.

summary: A simple choose-your-adventure RPG, set in the desert. You're a line man that's stolen the company truck, in search of enlightenment. Roll your dice, and get into trouble.

name: Brothel Secrets

Overcome the mischievous ghost, earn coins, and transform his house into the ultimate cozy Christmas haven. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Break, Enter, Repeat

name: Brave Escape
summary: Embark on a thrilling co-op adventure in 'Brave Escape,' a challenging platformer demanding teamwork to conquer perilous traps and treacherous terrain.

name: Broken Ecchi Gallery
summary: Someone broke into our gallery and destroyed all the paintings and now you need to restore them. Broken Ecchi Gallery - a puzzle game in which you need to restore paintings of beautiful girls from the fragments.

name: Bruxa Luna

name: Broadsword Jim Saves Christmas

name: Brain Quiz
summary:
Brain Quiz is a series of strategy games including clones of Maxit and Mastermind

Game 1: "Mindbreaker" - your opponent puts 5 numbers into the computer and you must guess the numbers and the sequence. This is "brain baffling". You can also play against the computer

Game 2: "Maxit" - one or two player. Try to get the "maximum" score
Play against the computer or against a friend

Game 3: "Hangman" - 2 player - Your opponent enters a word and you must guess it by process of inserting letters. If you lose, a "hanged effigy" appears.

name: Breakaway
summary: Breakaway is a clone of the Arcade game "Breakout"

name: Brute Wars
summary: Assemble a team of animal warriors to battle to the top of Mt. Asio. Unique turn-based battle system. Strategy/puzzle hybrid with some RPG elements.

name: Bright kingdom

name: Brilliance
summary: 《Brilliance》 is a 2D horizontal platform jumping game where you need to use jumps, dashes, super dashes, squats super dashes to get through levels.

name: Breached
summary: Prepare for an enthralling journey as you step into the mesmerizing voxel art world of "Breached." This roguelite twin-stick shooter seamlessly marries the thrill of rapid-fire combat with the nuanced strategy of rogue-inspired gameplay, creating a gaming experience like no other.

name: Brick Blaster
summary: Gather your weapons and blast your way through the bricks in this new twist to the classic brick breaking genre. Test your dexterity and aim as you wreak havoc on waves of defenseless bricks.

name: Broken Lands: Tower Defense

Fight on deserts, seas, forests and mountains, customizing your defensive strategy with different tower upgrades and specializations!

name: Bridges & Docks
summary: Build the island of your dreams - either by hand or using procedural generation tools. Adjust the quantity of bridges, the maximum height of the terrain - even how close trees are! Meticulously tweak all the configurations to generate uniquely enthralling island worlds!

name: Break Arcade Games Out
summary: What if Breakout was the only arcade game people could make? An open-source game, written entirely on a live stream.

name: Broken Covenant
summary:
In the year 2006, Climax LA started working on yet another tentative Silent Hill title exclusively for the PlayStation 3 using the Unreal 3 engine. After the project was declined by Konami it was converted into a stand-alone survival-horror title Broken Covenant.
The game was supposed to take place in the American Soutwest where Alessa's powers and corruption began to spread outside of Silent Hill. A splinter group of Silent Hill cult relocated its operations to an abandoned military base just outside Coyote Flats, Arizona continuing pursuing their main goal of conjuring Samael. Players would assume the role of Father Hector Santos, an El Paso, Texas priest in desperate search of his nine-year-old niece, Anna who has been handed over to the Cult as a conduit for demonic rituals as they believe she might be the next Alessa.

Broken Covenant was supposed to be published in episodic format. After it failed to seek any interest from other publishers it was shelved for good.

(Source: silenthillmemories)

name: Brave Shot 2

name: Brain Exam with Benefits

name: Broken World

name: BreakThru

Your mission: race, jump, and blast your way through five levels (mountains, bridge, plains, city, and airfield) of enemy defenses to recapture the stolen jet fighter. A host of enemy soldiers, mines, vehicles, and aircraft will try to stop you, though. Oh yeah... and don't forget to watch out for those rocket attacks and falling rocks!

name: Bravely Archive: D's Report
summary:
Bravely Archive: D's Report is a mobile video game released for iOS and Android devices. It ran from January 2015 to October 2017 in Japan. The game received a limited English release in North America in 2018.

The game plays as a social JRPG. The player creates a team of character consisting of various roles and job classes, such as black mages for attack magic and white mages for healing, and fight computer-controlled opponents in turn-based battles. Certain moves have the effect of launching characters into the air, where "combos" that deal extra damage can be performed.

name: Brick Game
summary: Tetris clone. This game comes in many different variations, ranging from normal Tetris pieces to complex variations featuring pentomino (five-block) pieces, random blocks appearing after time, falling "bombs" that can clear the blocks and even pieces that could shoot or pemetrate through other blocks. To avoid possible copyright infringement of the original Tetris, this game is simply named as the titular "Brick Game" or "Wooden Blocks" on the console's packaging or user manual.

name: Brink Game
summary: A Brick Game variant released in Brazil by Art Brink.

name: Brick Breaker Pro
summary: Brick Breaker Pro offers classic arcade fun with a modern twist! Break bricks, set high scores, and unlock achievements in this vibrant and addictive game.

name: Breaking Bound

name: Brand New World

It is an enchanting point-and-click style RPG with hundreds of hours of gameplay, set in a land of magic and mysteries, with a huge number of professions to try, and something new to find around every corner.

name: Brisk Up

name: Bridge Maker
summary: Each level presents a fresh puzzle, testing your creativity and engineering acumen.

name: Brave Glin in Fairyaria

If you have ever wondered how all those awesome structures are built, you now have a chance to take matters into your hands and build one for yourself!

name: Bricks

name: Brass Necessity

You've only got your laser as a weapon and crystals to change its element. You'll need to figure out matchups that work best against enemies to escape. Good luck, you'll need it!

summary: This is an adventure RPG with a focus on boss battles, defeating powerful enemies and gaining lots of equipment rewards. With different equipment to enhance yourself, challenge more powerful bosses and uncover the secrets of this fantasy world.

name: Brave Legacy

name: Break The Line

Rogue elements + Free Layout + Battle Mastery + Turn-based March.
What kind of different experience will it bring? Will you be able to hold on to a tower caught in a tidal wave of enemy attacks? May be the answer you're looking for.

name: Breakthru

name: Brotato: Abyssal Terrors

name: Brick Buster Blast

name: Bretonne Lais
summary: Bretonne Lais is a role-playing game loosely based on the Breton lays, medieval European (mostly French or English) romance tales drawing inspiration from chivalric stories and Celtic mythology and folklore. Rather than presenting a single story the game is divided into several unrelated scenarios, each involving Celtic legends and mostly focusing on supernatural motives (floating islands, unicorns, popular Celtic figures such as Queen Mab, etc.). The player can choose between several male and female characters with pre-defined anime-style portraits, allocating points into their primary parameters. Much of the game is played solo, though a few NPCs can join the main character one at a time. Despite its Japanese origins the game takes cues from Western RPG design philosophy, offering non-linear exploration of vast interconnected areas. Battles take place on the same screen as exploration and involve turn-based navigation and simple attack commands.

name: Brain Test 2: Tricky Stories
summary: Get ready to be bamboozled with all-new mind-twisting puzzles, including scenarios that require you to brain out and face brain test challenges. In this new brain game, puzzles have stories with colorful characters. Defeat the Lion King with Tom the Cat, cultivate your farm with Emily, or hunt monsters with Joe in these engaging brain test games. It is an easy to play, but hard to master game as there are various layers of difficulty with the tricky puzzle system. There are hundreds of story based mind games, IQ puzzles and quiz games. Brain Test 2 is a funny and tricky addition to the puzzle games of the world.

name: Brids Huddled Together

name: Broken Lands Village

Liquidate capitalist agitators to earn veneration from the Kims and ensure their bloodline perseveres to see a future free from imperialist aggression!

name: Brain Puzzles Bundle 12 in 1

name: Brass

With relaxing, story-driven gameplay and adorable low-poly art, Brass offers a cozy and heartwarming experience.

name: Breaking Time
summary: Breaking Time is a singleplayer first-person speedrun platformer game where the player's goal is to complete the game level in record time, progressing through a world that itself is fractured in time.

name: Briko

name: Brinkmanship

As a spaceborne colonist 20 years into your voyage you've just discovered that your ship has secretly altered its heading. Your parents give you a gun. The ship goes into lockdown. What do you do? Who will you trust?

name: Bridges of Patience
