name: Brick Storm
summary: Enter the world of Brickorium, an exhilarating rogue-lite brick-breaker game! Take on increasingly challenging waves of bricks, earn gold, and unlock a variety of bonuses to enhance your abilities. Test your reflexes in this thrilling arcade challenge where every playthrough is unique.

name: Bricking Bots
summary: Play as a brave little robot in a Retro 3D Collectathon! Solve room-sized physics puzzles, blast villains with your laser, and help your fellow workers rise against your tyrannical BOSS. The more bots you break, the easier each puzzle gets!

name: Brutal Bible Bloodbaths
summary: Based on a shocking Bible passage, use your magic laser sword to chop up everything that breathes causing blood to spray and splatter everywhere.

name: Brick Block
summary: A 3D tile editor, in your browser.

name: Brain Test: Mental Games
summary: Brain Test is an addictive tricky puzzle game with a series of tricky brain teasers. Different riddles and tricky tests will challenge your mind. This new puzzle game may break common sense and bring you a new brain-pushing experience!

name: BrokenLore: Low
summary: Low, a first-person Horror Game, immerses players in the dark prelude of BrokenLore's story. Set in a mist-shrouded Japanese village, players uncover deep-seated hatred and ancient secrets. Navigate a hyperrealistic, claustrophobic environment where supernatural forces and tragic cycles abound.

name: Break Free
summary: Come shoot some balls and break stuff in this incredible next-gen graphics with realistic physics fun game.

name: Broken Shell
summary: Broken Shell is a cute and cozy adventure game filled with love and courage. Join Mr. and Mrs. Hermit, an adorable couple, as they navigate through a charming world filled with puzzles, challenges, and heartwarming moments on their heartfelt journey to a better life.

name: Breadborn
summary: Breadborn is a crazy action game where you command an army of crumb minions that came from very own body. Branches, axes, or a killer mini-gun? It's up to you to decide how to equip your army in order to sow chaos among the peasants and get to the PRINCE himself!

name: Brainwave Trials
summary: Brainwave Trials presents itself as a first-person puzzle-platformer experience where the player takes the role of a volunteer within the Garnet Research And Development Sector. By utilizing parkour mechanics and dimensional manipulation, the player will be able to overcome the trials of science.

name: Brok the Investigator: The Brawl Bar
summary: All-action additional content for BROK the InvestiGator. Fight your way through new enemies, tackle crazy challenges, and make new friends!

name: BreakBall
summary: Shoot your friends with balls that bounce off walls in this fast-paced tactical arena fighter. Discover dozens of modifiers and millions of combinations, and beat your friends by being the fastest to adapt to the ever-changing rules!

name: Break It
summary: Break It is a fast paced casual game.

name: Brutal Katana
summary: BRUTAL KATANA is a short, satisfying, first-person parkour action platformer about quickly slicing statues in half.

name: Break Games
summary: In need of a small break while streaming? Launch a break game and let your community defend your stream from an alien invasion or get them riled up with an exclusive giveaway game! Break Games offer fun games to engage your community while you are on a short break!

name: Break the Empire
summary: A straight forward, action-rougelite game. No lore, no story, no choices other than how to build your character and how to kill/conquer. Permadeath, unique builds, wild combinations and high replayability!

name: BrainZ Defender
summary: Unleash chaos in BrainZ Defender, the ultimate tower defense FPS! Freeze, burn, and electrocute hordes of relentless zombies with deadly traps and weapons. Strategize your defenses, protect the Brain, and survive the undead apocalypse as you fight to secure humanity's future!

name: Break an Egg
summary: A homebrew game for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive in which the player controls a chicken who has to prevent falling eggs to fall on the ground, aiming to get them into a basket.

name: Broken Ceiling
summary: Broken Ceiling is a hand drawn, 2D, top-down eldritch horror adventure video game. Set in deep dark caverns the main mechanic is the light field around the character that needs to be repeatedly recharged to be able to explore the secrets of the game.

name: Britney Spears' Theme Park
summary: A fan game for the pop icon of the century

name: Brick Breaker Infinity
summary: Break bricks, collect power-ups, endless levels for high scores. Test your skills, adaptability, and strategy. Addictive and fun! Let's play!

name: Brutus Maximus
summary: Embark on a hellish road trip around the Roman Empire. From Teutoburg to Rome, slay anything standing in your way, survival roguelite-style. Unlock new heroes, weapons, and skills to create synergies. Wipe out entire Roman legions in this hack-and-slash, stab, and shoot survivors game.

name: Brendon's Water Polo
summary: Where we celebrate the action-packed Water Polo sport, hitting a yellow ball back and forth until one player manages to get past their opponent. First to seven points wins!

name: Bread Fish Clicker
summary: A simple and fun game where players click on a fish and a piece of bread to increase their respective counters.

name: Brotes
summary: A kiwi and his brother who is a little plant live their adventures and stuff. You meet nice people, very nice people and people who are a little sassy but who are nice all the same. You hit the A to roll which is super funny. You can also tap on happy birthday.

name: Brickgame
summary: A TIC-80 port of some games from Brick Game consoles.

name: Break a Leg
summary: Break a Leg is a series done over YouTube shorts where the top comment got the next addition to the game. Break a Leg is a game where your primary goal is to break your leg. Once you do, you did it. You won. Therefore, there's no more reason to keep playing this game.

name: Brilliantcrypto
summary:
Brilliantcrypto is a PC game where the main aim is to mine for digital gemstones. Players enter mines and use all of the tools at their disposal, including a pickaxe, a gemstone detector, dynamite, and even the adorable company mascot Rupert!

To acquire a mine and get started, users need to own an NFT pickaxe, but it is possible to borrow one in-game and mine in someone else's mine, so it is free to download and get started.

Users can trade the gemstones they have mined on the market for cryptocurrency, making this a play-to-earn title. They can also earn the BRIL token while mining, which can be reused in game to make mining more efficient, or exported and traded on marketplaces.

Other actions include searching for mines, upgrading your pickaxe and mines, and viewing the gemstones you've mined in a high-quality inspection experience.

Up to 6 players can play in the same mine.

name: Brutalist
summary: Brutalist is a third-person meditative game where you need to follow paths, find passages, solve riddles, watch out for radiation and monitor oxygen levels. And all this is surrounded by an atmospheric abandoned concrete world.

name: Bridge Between Two Islands
summary: Duke's mission is to destroy the big gun on the top of the island.

name: Breakout
summary: When the first fully-assembled Apple II systems began shipping in June 1977, a single tape cassette was included, containing demonstration programs written in Integer BASIC by Steve Wozniak. Notably, one side of the tape held the first Apple II version of Breakout, inspired by Wozniak's own work on Atari's blockbuster arcade game of the same title.

name: Brawl Arena: Arcade Shooter
summary: An exciting top down arena shooter with unique characters, powerful enemies, incredible bosses and a huge arsenal of weapons!

name: Brain Training!! Number Search
summary:
Find the indicated number among many numbers!
This is a number-finding brain training game that exercises your quick thinking skills!

name: Brave and Glory
summary: This thrilling real-time strategy tower defense game immerses you in a three-dimensional world, where every decision matters and every action impacts the outcome of the battle. Get ready for epic battles and become the hero of the kingdom!

name: Broken War
summary: Broken War is an intense first-person shooter that combines different multiplayer modes.

name: Broccoli
summary: Broccoli is a clicker game, in this clicker game, you can click a Broccoli! When you click the Broccoli, you gain even more Broccoli! Every 2 and 10 hours you will get dropped a Broccoli! Every Broccoli is made by the community in the discord, come join us and lets make a great community, together!

name: Brink of War
summary: Brink of War is a fast-paced and realistic first person shooter (FPS) game. Everyone can experience the excitement of confrontation. In this game, you can team up with friends in different modes and maps of varying intensity to fight against enemies and compete for victory.

name: Brucie's Arcade
summary: A retro arcade game bundle where you must manage a restaurant through four mini-games: Ingredient Run, Cooking, Serving, and Stacking Leftovers. Each game offers unique challenges packaged up in a familiar, replayable arcade format.

name: Brentwood
summary: Brentwood is a story-based 2D point and click adventure game.Through your journey you will uncover hidden secrets and your choices will shape the destiny of both characters and the world around them, leading to multiple endings that show the impact of your decisions.

name: Brawlers of Duality
summary: Brawlers of Duality is an arena fighter where damaging enemies launches them harder. Launch enemies into obstacles to defeat them using martial arts, magic and technology. Battle in 1v1, 2v2, and a mode where you collect loot to power up and fight in a free for all.

name: Bravest Coconut
summary: Bravest Coconut is a silly game about solving story-driven puzzles, meeting a cast of quirky characters, and exploring a world littered with secrets... and you’re a cat.

name: Brawl of America
summary: Welcome to Brawl of America, the wackiest physics-based brawler where chaos reigns supreme! Dive into frenetic battles where everything and everyone is a weapon. From chairs and tables to your fellow brawlers, if you can pick it up, you can throw it!

name: Broke in Isekai
summary: Broke and down on your luck, you enter a portal to another world, only to find out that your fortunes there aren't any better. Broke in another world, you have to find a way to survive in a corrupt city. At least there are beautiful women of various fantastical races to build relationships with.

name: Brotherhood of Ruin 2024: Element Temple Research Complex
summary: This is a very large UDMF map which has many different routes to take and uses the Supercharge mod.

name: BrickLike
summary: A refreshing twist on an old classic, mixing arcade gameplay with the roguelike genre. Test your skill, break bricks, make combos, turns balls aflame and electrify bosses in this frenetic experience!

name: Broken Tape
summary: Broken Tape is a narrative-driven first person walking simulator with the elements of psychological horror. You take the role of a test subject in a secret organization. You were tasked with a job to eliminate anomalies in a series of old tapes, containing more than you might expect.

name: Bring Your Own Class
summary:
BYOC (Bring Your Own Class) is a modification for Doom 2 that aims to collaborate creators from a private community to have them Bring Yheir Own Classes in ZDoom derivative sourceports like: Zandronum. While it's made for online, Co-op play, this can be played offline as well.

In the mod there will be both well known characters that you know and love (e.g. Doomguy from Doom, Dr. Doomguy from Dr. Doom, Peppino from Pizza Tower, Heavy from TF2, Serious Sam from Serious Sam, Sir Dan from Medievil, Quote from Cave Story and PTG from PTG) and some original author created characters!

name: Brony Cards
summary: Brony Cards is ponified version of 2048 made in Adobe Flash.

name: Brain Out: Can You Pass It?
summary: “Brain Out” is an addictive free tricky puzzle game with a series of tricky brain teasers and different riddles testing challenge your mind. It evaluates your logical think ability, reflexes, accuracy, memory and creativity. Do not answer the quests in the ordinary way if you don’t want to be tricked. The solution subverts normal thinking is the most interesting thing in this trivia game. We bring you a different game experience with creative thinking and absurd solution.

name: Brick Breaker DEMOLITION
summary:
Destroy all the bricks to pass phase and enjoy the spectacular visual effects in this clone of the famous game Bricks Break were so popular in the 70's and 80's and that you can carry in your pocket everywhere.

There are two control modes ball: Classic, where the bounce angle depends on the point of impact on the racket (steeper as more far from the center) and Demolition, where the bounce angle depends on the angle of incidence and the movement of the racket.

DEMOLITION currently consists of 800 levels but will be adding more. To overcome them you will have various aids, although sometimes they can hinder you work, as can be changes in the size of the racket or the speed of the balls multiplier balls, barrier, fireballs, gravity, change visibility bricks ...

You also have a limited number of wildcards or 'jokers' to skip levels that can not be able to complete.

name: Brothel Tycoon
summary: Brothel Tycoon is a simulation game where you have to help Yvonne, in any way possible, including sex if necessary, to develop her business from a small cafe to a luxury entertainment place for adults.

name: Brutalist Golf
summary: Post Industrial Horror (Golf)

name: Brute Horse
summary: Brute Horse takes you into a savage world of South Vulgaria. Play as barbarian called "Brute", carrying his injured companion through the divided kingdoms. With the help of Michelle, an inventress, forge an unlikely bond, either in singleplayer or coop, that will change Brute's fate forever.

name: Brigand: Nightmare
summary:
BRIGAND - NIGHTMARE revamps the original story of BRIGAND - OAXACA, adding in more difficulty and new features from the BRIGAND - PANAMA DLC such as woodcraft, traps, and voodoo-casting baddies, as well as a new optional map accessible from Chapter 6 on.

It's a lot harder than the original, meant for hardcore fans. Hunger increases 50% faster, and baddie AI now picks up items. There is also a partial Spanish translation included called NIGHTMARE (ES).

name: Breakers
summary: It is a turn-based hip-hop-breaking dance game where two players compete in intense dance battles. With 60 seconds to perform moves and earn points, QUARC blends the energy of breaking dance with strategy, offering a unique and engaging experience.

name: Bruma
summary:
Bruma is a game about Crossing into the sea and meeting a very big fish.
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2024 by the Coletivo Brejo.

name: Brave New World 2
summary:
BNW2 contains a total of 100 rooms across 26 exits, with 13 exits for Any% (no secrets/palaces). Most levels are 5-7 rooms in length.

Just like its predecessor, BNW2 is a showcase of glitches that exist within Super Mario World engine.
Some of these glitches (commonly found in "Kuso" hacks) can be extremely precise and require frame-perfect inputs.
My intent was to make the execution of glitches as simple as possible while still being challenging and fun.
Though the custom ASM & graphics prevent BNW2 from being a completely "vanilla" hack, the glitch tech involved *is* vanilla and can be reproduced in the base game.

name: Bristle and the Artificial Invasion
summary: Bristle and the Artificial Invasion is a platformer game made in GB Studio that tells the story of a paintbrush named Bristle, whose planet is invaded by an army of artificially generated monsters. It's up to Bristle to rescue his friends and save any neighboring planets affected by this catastrophe.

name: Brawl+
summary:
Brawl Plus is one of the first mods released for Super Smash Bros. Brawl, primarily intended for competitive play, but includes many quality of life features, such as the removal of random tripping and separated character icons for Sheik, Zelda, and the Pokémon Trainer.

It was abandoned following Version 7.0.3 in 2010, with most moving on to the mod's spiritual successor, Project M.

name: Brain Training!! Hiragana ＆ Katakana Search
summary:
Find the indicated letters among many letters!
This is a brain training game to train your quick thinking skills!

name: Bring Me that Shawarma: Supporter Pack
summary:
Bring Me that Shawarma – Supporter Pack includes:

Bonus episode “Shawarma Snuff” (WILL BE AVAILABLE JULY 2024)
High-resolution arts
Artwork and photos without post-processing
History of the project creation with comments from the developers
Infinite love from the authors
New episodes will be able to come out faster!

name: Brawlhalla: Bonus Pack 14
summary:
This pack includes:
• Forsaken Magyar Skin
• Magyar Legend Unlock
• Nightmare Mauler Hammer Skin

name: Broadtrip
summary: Furry RPG made in OHRRPGCE.

name: Brewed Horizons
summary: Design your boat, tailor a drink menu fit for royalty and serve drinks while navigating through the kingdom. Explore the high seas with your boat! The islanders need a ferry, and he kingdom needs you to uncover the mystery of the Coffee Queen's disappearance!

name: Brazilian Drug Dealer 3: I Opened a Portal to Hell in the Favela Trying To Revive Mit Aia I Need to Close It
summary: Brazilian Drug Dealer 3 is a fast-paced ultraviolent Brazilian old-school FPS heavily inspired by the first Quake, using the same engine as the game (ID TECH2). made as a tribute to the Brazilian mods of the 2000s, the Brazilian bootleg games of the 2000s, Brazilian music, and the King of Brazilian music, Mit Aia!

name: Bring Me...
summary:
Bring me... is a first-person anomaly-horror game.
Play as a young woman who has been caring for her sick father and has been trapped in an anomalous cycle.
Observe your surroundings for anomalies to find your way out of this nightmare.

name: Brawlhalla: Ezio Starter Pack
summary:
The Ezio Starter Pack is DLC for the game Brawlhalla. This pack contains a few non-exclusive items and Mammoth Coins at a reduced price. It is aimed towards new players who may just be starting to play Brawlhalla.

This pack includes:
- Ezio Legend Unlock
- Revelations Ezio Skin
- 140 Mammoth Coins

name: Bramble Royale: A Meteorfall Story
summary: Bramble Royale is a wild, no-holds barred card brawl in the wacky world of Meteorfall. Build a face-melting deck, break the rules, and stomp your opponents in this fast-paced & fresh take on roguelike deckbuilders.

name: Brave Meow World
summary: A lightweight strategy game about controlling cat soldiers to defeat enemies and defend the base.

name: Brawl Stars: Welcome To Starr Park!
Brawl Stars: Once Upon A Brawl
Brawl Stars: Year Of The Tiger
Brawl Stars: The Deep Sea Brawl
Brawl Stars: Mystery At The Hub
Brawl Stars: Back To Ranger Ranch
Brawl Stars: Year Of The Dragon
Braaains
summary: Braaains is an exciting, deep, action-packed game for Facebook users. Players are able to build a team of amazing Zombies, amassing a horde and battling their friends. Players can watch the combat happen right before their eyes, leveling up their player and buying new weapons, enhancements, and abilities. There is no stop to the fun players can have customizing and creating a unique and powerful horde of Zombies.

name: Bratty Bottoms!
summary: Play as a hardworking newcomer hired to help manage the family-owned motel, run by the bratty yet endearing Lila.

name: Broad Daylight
summary: The day awaits. Whether it ends with you going to visit family, taking a breath in the park, or hiding inside your apartment, it all can be taken away without you having a say in the matter. Regardless of all the chances that life might provide, one truth persists: carpe diem.

name: Brewtopia
summary: Build up your perfect coffee utopia as you challenge corporate coffee control through sustainable growing and harvesting your coffee cherry plants. Grow your very own beans, channel your inner barista as you brew up drinks, help out your friendly neighbours, and discover rare coffee varieties.

name: Breakout 3
summary:
Breakout 3 is based on the arcade game Breakout but instead of the bat on the bottom of the screen, the bat is on the left side of the screen. The aim is to hit bricks on the right of the screen to make them disappear but if you let the ball past the bat then you lose one of three lives. Before the start of the game you can choose whether to play with one or two bats, and playing with two bats has them parallel to each other a small distance apart. There are also three types of games to play and they are:

Practise Game: A normal game with the choice to choose the speed of the bat (1-4) with 1 being the slowest.

Progressive Game: Every time you hit the ball it speeds up and also removing a set of bricks makes the ball faster.

Acceleration Game: The ball will speed up for every 10th brick disappearing and it speeds up when all the bricks have been removed.

name: BrokenLore: Don't Watch
summary: In BrokenLore: DON'T WATCH, immerse yourself in the haunting world of Shinji, a young hikikomori trapped in his Tokyo apartment. As his mind unravels, confront a malevolent entity watching from the shadows. Will you uncover the truth before it's too late?

name: Brain Drain
summary:
Brain Drain is a little cute-em-up with four zones in a long single level.

Each zone ends with it's own boss.

Get hit once and die.

name: Break Wolf
summary: An Adventure RPG that deals with the life and death of wayward humans, striving to escape a syndicate that creates monsters.

name: Bronana
summary: Bronana is a thrilling and hilarious survival roguelike. Embody the spirit of a fearless banana warrior to take down waves of vicious snack monsters. Through a rich variety of random events, grow stronger, evolve abilities, and face off against challenging bosses to save the homeland.

name: Bricks Survivors
summary: Bricks Survivors combine le charme des casse-briques rétro avec l'intensité des roguelites modernes. Survivez à des vagues de briques rapides et affrontez des boss en pixel art, le tout conçu par un seul créateur. Une expérience unique et addictive, disponible exclusivement sur PC.

name: Brain Code
summary: Welcome to brain code, a collection of hard puzzle games that will test the full power of your brain! With 50 unique levels, you'll need to use your creativity, attentiveness, and problem-solving skills to find the solutions.

name: Bricks Kingdom
summary: In a realm where magic and mechanics have come together in perfect harmony, life thrives on the vibrant energy of Superbricks. Yet ominous clouds loom over this tranquil land of brick-builders. The mysterious Shadow Waves have their own plans for the power of these bricks, and it will take brave heroes to safeguard this power and save their world.

name: Breadbox
summary: Breadbox is a fascinating retro computer simulator that allows you to step back in time and experience the magic of machines from the 70s and 80s. In this visual environment, you can interact with hardware and old media as if they were real.

name: Breeze Contest
summary: The Breeze Contest is a massive Celeste project featuring the largest lobby in the game’s history, with development spanning three months and map creation taking just over one month. This autumn-themed lobby includes 75 unique beginner maps, a Heartside, 200+ strawberries, custom code, extensive custom sprite work, a beautiful endscreen by Fuwamo, and original music. However, using debug tools may cause issues within the lobby or maps. To fully enjoy the mod, make sure to download the Breeze Contest Audio Pack, which is required for some features to work. Enjoy the journey through these beginner-friendly maps!

name: Brain Test: Tricky Puzzles
summary: Brain Test is an addictive free tricky puzzle game with a series of tricky brain teasers. Different riddles and tricky tests will challenge your mind. This new puzzle game may break common sense and bring your new brain-pushing experience!

name: Breakfast Brawl
summary: Boring and normal breakfasts are over! Fight against a mutant cereal bowl, a sandwich, some muffins.

name: Brahmarakshas
summary: "The Cursed Monk" provides a rich narrative experience, combining exploration, puzzle-solving. The village, named Bhagwatpur , is a picturesque and tranquil place nestled at the foothills of the Himalayas.

name: Broken Time
summary: Broken Time - a world where time no longer matters. This low-polygon action game immerses players in a post-apocalyptic environment where every movement changes the course of events. Fight and gather resources to survive in this madness.

name: Braiser
summary: You just woke up in the midst of a blazing furnace at the fire station... Will you be able to stand strong against the burning reality ? FIND AND STOP ALL THE FIRES... A short horror game made for the Haunted PS1 Halloween jam 2022 in around 10 days.

name: Breath of Death VII: The Beginning - Reanimated
summary: The fast-paced supernatural RPG, Breath of Death VII, has been resurrected and remastered! Embark with our undead heroes on a bone-rattling post-apocalyptic adventure through an undead world, now more vibrant than ever, to exhume the mysteries of the past.

name: BrokenLore: Dark Dawn
summary: BrokenLore: DARK DAWN is a first-person psychological horror where you face the horrors of abduction and fight to escape a warped reality. Do you have what it takes?

name: Bridge Constructor Studio
summary:
Test your construction expertise with dozens of distinct bridge-building puzzles across varied biomes. Seven different vehicles and multiple construction materials (wood, steel, cables, concrete pillars, and roadways) ensure each puzzle is a fresh and varied challenge.

With no budget restrictions or material limits, you are free to experiment and design without constraints. For an extra challenge, earn a special award by keeping costs within a set budget while ensuring your bridge holds up under pressure!

Design and play your very own bridge-building scenarios! Choose from five biomes, seven vehicles, and a variety of obstacles and checkpoints to design your own challenges. Up to 40 custom levels can be saved per player profile.

Mixed Reality (Quest 3 Exclusive): View your creations in the real world with Mixed Reality! Seamlessly switch between VR and Passthrough modes to experience the game in a whole new way.

name: Brok: Natal Tail, A New Christmas
summary: A Christmas tale set in the world of BROK the InvestiGator, presented as a visual novel.

name: Bricksbumpbump
summary: bricksbumpbump is a local multiplayer party game (supporting up to 4 players). In the game, you need to control your character to move and stack blocks like building with toy bricks to achieve the game objectives. The first one to meet the objective wins the game.

name: Broken Psyche
summary: Play as a detective investigating his wife's disappearance. Suspecting the asylum she was researching, he infiltrates it, only to uncover a realm of horror. Solve puzzles, maintain sanity, and confront monsters as you unravel the asylum's secrets.

name: Break.Up
summary: break.up is a block-breaking roguelite all about bouncing your ball as high as it can go.

name: Breast Simulator
summary: Breast Simulator is a fast-paced third-person arena survival game, where you face a multitude of unknown rivals, each with unique abilities and tactics. Earn the favor of powerful alien overlords through your combat prowess, gaining access to critical upgrades and enhancements.

name: Breaker Initiating
summary: BREAKER: INITIATING is a short 3D game featuring platforming and puzzle-solving elements. You step into the role of El, a robot equipped with electrical discharge abilities. Navigate through a desolate world, using El's unique powers to overcome obstacles and explore mysterious environments.

name: Brisk
summary: Brisk is a set of 30 maps in MBF21 format where each map was created in 24 hours by various authors.

name: Brawlhalla: Bonus Pack 16
summary:
A PlayStation Plus exclusive pack, this was free for all subscribers.

This pack included:
- Caspian Legend Unlock
- All-City Caspian Skin
- Nightmare Claws Weapon Skin

name: Bridge to Another World: Escape From Oz
summary:
From 4Friends, creators of Living Legends, comes an exciting new game in the Bridge to Another World series!

Today started out like any other day – you sent your kids off to school and settled in for some peace and quiet with your little dog, Toto. But your world is turned upside-down when a tornado suddenly appears and carries your house to the extraordinary land of Oz. Now you find yourself in the middle of a fierce competition controlled by the mysterious Great Wizard. To earn your way back home, you and Toto must explore the four corners of Oz, facing enemies, obstacles, and puzzles at every turn! Are you up to the challenge? Find out in this Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

name: Bright Side: Quiz
summary: Compete with family and friends to uncover the ultimate quiz champion!

name: Brew in Blizzard
summary: Temporary seasonal job with a chance of a continuing connection

name: Brotato + Abyssal Terrors DLC Bundle
summary: The Brotato + Abyssal Terrors DLC Bundle is a Bundle including Brotato and it's Abyssal Terrors DLC.

name: Bright Escape
summary: Embark on a magical journey in Bright Escape!

name: BrickMania
summary: Classic arcade Brick Breaker reinvented - relaxing, satisfying and challenging!

name: Breakout
summary: Experience fast-paced shotgun carnage in this mini-roguelite boomer shooter like no other! Fight through over 100 procedurally linked combat arenas, upgrade your fighting abilities and destroy an ever increasing amount of enemy types. A metal army hellbent on destruction stand between you and freedom. Are you ready to take them on?

name: BrebeMan
summary: Save the world with breakbeats.

name: Brave Sword
summary:
Brave Sword is an RPG game that takes place in the land of Memphis, the player can choose between a male or female character (both can be customizable), in his quest the player will have the help of two other adventures, Mary & Los.

The player begins his quest in a town where you can buy new weapons, items and armors. During battles you will have to control your characters by giving them commands.

name: Brookwood: Pocket Tactics
summary: A gameboy color tactical RPG with a Redwall twist.

name: Brendan Keogh's Putting Land
summary: A relaxing, open-world golf game about all the stuff other golf games leave out.

name: Brains & Hearts
summary:
A two player card game that takes place inside Albert Einstein's dream. Play against the CPU or a friend.

Game available on Retro Game Crunch.

name: Breakout Beyond
summary: Breakout is back! In this neon-drenched take on the classic, you’ll need to literally break through each puzzle by clearing bricks to breach the final goal. Rack up a combo and create spectacular light shows alone or with a friend.

name: Brelok: Nezumi-tachi no Dasshutsu
summary: “BRELOK - Escape of the mice -” is a cooperative escape game exclusively for two players. Play together with your family, friends, or your significant other.

name: BrasFoot 2004
summary: BrasFoot 2004 is the second iteration of the soccer management simulator focused on Brazilian teams where you can buy and view players from other teams at any time during the game, manually select players for each match, change the ticket prices of the game at any time, and much more.

name: BrasFoot 2005
summary: BrasFoot 2005 is the third iteration of the soccer management simulator focused on Brazilian teams where you can buy and view players from other teams at any time during the game, manually select players for each match, change the ticket prices of the game at any time, and much more.

name: BrasFoot 2006
summary: BrasFoot 2006 is the fourth iteration of the soccer management simulator focused on Brazilian teams where you can buy and view players from other teams at any time during the game, manually select players for each match, change the ticket prices of the game at any time, and much more.

name: BrasFoot 2007
summary: BrasFoot 2007 is the fifth iteration of the soccer management simulator focused on Brazilian teams where you can buy and view players from other teams at any time during the game, manually select players for each match, change the ticket prices of the game at any time, and much more.

name: BrasFoot 2008
summary: BrasFoot 2008 is the sixth iteration of the soccer management simulator focused on Brazilian teams where you can buy and view players from other teams at any time during the game, manually select players for each match, change the ticket prices of the game at any time, and much more.

name: BrasFoot 2009
summary: BrasFoot 2009 is the seventh iteration of the soccer management simulator focused on Brazilian teams where you can buy and view players from other teams at any time during the game, manually select players for each match, change the ticket prices of the game at any time, and much more.

name: Broke Alchemist Emma's Debt Repayment Plan
summary:
Emma is a young alchemist who lives in Echichi Town. Life is great for her until one day, her mother suddenly goes missing. It turns out that her mother had incurred a hefty debt of 1,000,000 gold to the Baron of Echichi Town, Lord Umuru.

There are a variety of quests and bounties commissioned by the Adventurer's Guild that pay handsome rewards, but require Emma to dive head-first into peril and danger. On the other hand, she can make use of her alchemical abilities to complete quests to help out the villagers and guild alike. What mysteries await Emma on her journey to repay her debt? Will she find out the truth of what happened to her mother? Just what is going on with some of the people in Echichi Town?

name: Bright Side: Quiz - Complete Edition
summary: Compete with family and friends to uncover the ultimate quiz champion!

name: Brick Breaker: Infinity
summary: Get ready for the ultimate brick-breaking experience meticulously crafted by a single developer! With over 100+ Unique Levels in unlimited combinations, this game guarantees endless excitement and challenges. Break, smash, and conquer your way through an array of meticulously designed levels that will test your skills and reflexes.

name: Broken Sword Collection
summary: Paris in the fall holds many memories for George Stobbart: of cafés, of music, of love, and of death. Now on Evercade, you can explore the first two adventures in this legendary series, presented in their original 32-bit console form.

name: Breeze of Ashes
summary: Command airships in a tactical RTS where choices shape your story. Manage resources, upgrade your fleet, and battle rival factions in a non-linear campaign. With rogue-lite replayability, multiplayer co-op, and skirmish modes, your journey evolves with every playthrough.

name: Broventure: The Wild Co-op
summary: Broventure = Vampire Survival + Base building + Co-op. Band together with friends and obliterate hordes of grueling enemies, gather crucial resources, and transform your camp into a sanctuary of liberation.

name: Braise
summary: Dive into the fantasy world of Braise, a narrative adventure game. Explore the Dragon’s Valley and complete quests and puzzles to uncover the mysteries it holds.

name: Braveboy
summary: Pick your breed, and build your clan. An open-world adventure about a pup from the Scottish highlands destined to the lead a rebellion against the evil Cat King Of England.

name: Brutalistika
summary: BRUTALISTIKA is an immersive and contemplative experience. In this walking simulator, explore mysterious and intriguing liminal spaces with neo-brutalist architecture at your own pace, filled with serene pools and interactive works that invite you to be aware of your emotions.

name: Brawlers of the West
summary: Brawlers of the West is a physics-based fighting game.

name: Break Siege
summary: Break Siege is a train-themed deck-building rougelike game in which you constantly construct your own deck and breakthrough forces of the Empire in intense, real-time battles.

name: Breaking Bricks
summary: Get ready to experience the thrill of BREAKING BRICKS, an addictive arcade game that will captivate players of all ages. With 40 challenging levels, you’ll have a blast breaking bricks and progressing to new stages. The goal of BREAKING BRICKS is simple: use your skill and quick reflexes to destroy all the blocks on the screen. But it won’t be as easy as it sounds! As you advance through the levels, the blocks become tougher, requiring smart strategies to overcome each challenge. What truly sets BREAKING BRICKS apart are the exciting power-ups you’ll discover throughout the game. These power-ups range from extra balls to multiply your score, to powerful weapons that destroy multiple blocks at once. Each power-up adds an extra layer of excitement and strategy, keeping you on your toes and eager for more. With its fast-paced action and intuitive controls, BREAKING BRICKS delivers an engaging experience from start to finish. Every level provides a sense of achievement as you progress.

name: Break My Case
summary:
"I'll take care of that problem for you."

A story about unraveling and cutting tangled threads.

Aporia, a store staffed by talented but somewhat out-of-the-ordinary employees, has two faces.
After operating as an ordinary cafe, only a limited number of customers are offered a relaxing time and special services.

Anything that can be done in place of a living person>

In a city where everything is saturated, responding to what is "not enough" - multi agency.

"You should work for me! As my representative, that is...as the owner's representative!"

A strange connection with such a store.
Surpass the situation on behalf of someone else.
An uncertain and sad day begins with them, where anything can take their place.

name: Broken Sun
summary: What do you do when your heart is replaced with a shard of the Sun, giving you great power? Free yourself from the shackles of death, defy the gods, and change the fate of the Lotus World! Enter into an epic battle of the gods! Explore your newfound abilities and fight in PvE and PvP modes in the most up-to-date MMORPG for browsers and smartphones (Android and iOS).

name: Brighter Than Burning
summary: A fast-paced running-focused platformer inspired by classic side-scrollers.

name: Brave
summary: Solve intricate puzzles and evade obstacles with precise, skillful platforming. Collect musical instruments that change your environment with ancient magic, and gain skills and items that enhance your ability to move through that environment. Succeed, and you may just save your family.

name: Brigands
summary: Take command of a powerful steampunk airship in this fast-paced bullet hell shooter! Battle through 3 unique worlds, upgrade your ship with powerful weapons, and face off against epic bosses. Customize your challenge with adjustable difficulty—can you become the true Captain of the Skies?

name: Brainbots
summary: Enter the subject's brain and eliminate the alien forces!

name: Bridge Race & Stacky Dash
summary: Get ready for a thrilling duo of fast-paced, brick-stacking action with Bridge Race and Stacky Dash!

name: Brominion
summary: Brominion is an interactive overlay strategy game for live broadcasters on Twitch. Through the chat, viewers can farm resources to build an army, hunt monsters and even duel other viewers!

name: Brickle
summary:
Brickle, the ultimate shape-fitting challenge! Compete against players from around the world as you strive to complete puzzles with the fewest moves, and the fastest time.
Brickle combines the thrill of competition with the satisfaction of puzzle-solving. Every day, a new mind-bending challenge awaits, keeping your brain sharp and your skills honed. Can you conquer the daily puzzle and claim your spot on the leaderboard?

name: Brush Burial: Gutter World
summary: A murky first-person immersive sim with tightly-wound melee combat and tangled, vertical levels to explore. Use your forked tail to tie your enemies in knots and climb impossible heights. Kill your mark with quickness and cunning, using whatever tools you see fit.

name: BrainRot
summary: A party pvp game based on brainrot trends.

name: Breakthrough
summary: Breakthrough is a game where you create an efficient electricity circuit in a smaller space, with fewer parts. Obtain "100rW"(Revolution watt) to make a breakthrough, and improve circuits more!

name: Braving Chronicles
summary: Experience a variety of stories that chronicle the tales of a boundlessly creative universe through a tactical, team-building no microtransactions gacha system featuring a wide variety of characters to utilize amidst the many tales of the Braving Universe.

name: Break Point
summary: Break Point is a heartwarming story of growth, friendship, and taking chances, showcasing how shared passions can create unexpected and meaningful connections.

name: Bridge Encounter
summary: Two girls meet at a bridge and have pointless conversations.

name: Bravely Default: Flying Fairy - HD Remaster
summary:
Bravely Default, the first title in the Bravely series, remastered in high definition for a single screen. Discover the origins of the classic Brave and Default battle system alongside new and enhanced features. The story of light and shadow that never fades is reborn!

This version includes two new minigames: Luxencheer Rhythm Catch and Ringabel’s Panic Cruise.

name: Bring the Book Back
summary: You wake up on the floor of a library, guilt-ridden for forgetting to return your borrowed book. Now, you find yourself trapped in an endless loop of bringing it back to ease your conscience, forced to check for anomalies to work off your debt.

name: Brixby
summary: Join Brixby, the block-headed hero, on his quest to stop Shadowblock and his Greyblock minions from taking over the land. Run, Jump, & Stomp your way through the many different terrains of The Golden Block Kingdom and save Princess Goldie Bloxx.

name: Brain Boom
summary: Plunge into the atmosphere of mad fun with funny zombies.

name: Braise Satan
summary: BRAISE SATAN is a frantic cooking game set in Hell. Chop, fry, and blend your way to heaven, while fighting off the mischievous imps.

name: Bread
summary: Bread is a fun and simple clicker game where your goal is to click on a loaf of bread as many times as possible! Each click brings you closer to unlocking unique achievements and customizing your experience. No baking, just endless bread-clicking fun. Ready to start clicking?

name: Bread
summary: The Royal Bakery welcomes you to Bread, a fun simple clicker game. Stay a while, have some fun and click a crumb. Careful too much bread makes you fat.

name: Bread & Bravery
summary: Return to the era of knights and castles in a uniquely satisfying mix of Settlement Building, RTS and Castle Simulation genres. Manage complex and realistic medieval production chains, build your army and defences, satisfy the King and lead your people to prosperity. Will you succeed as a new lord?

name: Bread & Butter
summary: A roguelite arena shooter starring you, a gutsy bread slice, and your butter buddy battling side by side. Survive waves of evil veggies, stack wild weapon combos, and unleash absurd builds in relentless top-down chaos.

name: Breecell
summary: Breecell is a simple yet profound puzzle game that allows you to enjoy deep strategy. Aim for a high score by increasing and erasing cells in a chain! Slide the board to escape from a pinch as you earn a higher score. Aim for the top of the world ranking!

name: Bricks Over Blocks
summary: Bricks Over Blocks is a fast-paced 3D side-scroller blending platforming with brick-breaking mechanics. Smash bricks, dodge hazards, defend the blocks underfoot, and use power-ups to conquer challenging levels. It’s a fresh take on a classic genre. Are you ready to break through?

name: Bridge to Another World: The Christmas Curse - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you travel to the North Pole and stop Krampus time?

name: Brainrot Dash
summary:
Borsiis Dash is a unique project where the community takes center stage. In this 2D action game, you'll jump, dodge, and use your dash to break through incoming blocks, keeping the adrenaline high.

Every run offers a new challenge—race, jump, and shatter obstacles as you chase your personal record. The best part? Your feedback and suggestions help shape the game, ensuring it evolves based on what our community loves.

Ready to test your reflexes and push your limits? Join our community and dive into the Borsiis Dash experience!

name: Breaking the Grip
summary: Breaking the Grip is a multiplayer horror and strategy game. As a survivor, complete a ritual to eliminate the spirit before it drives you insane. As the spirit, spread terror and break their will. Who will prevail between life and the beyond?

name: Bridge
summary: A very difficult bridge crossing simulator

name: Brave New Wonders
summary: Command automatons with customized instructions to build Brave New Wonders in this factory automation game. You can deploy your automatons to explore a post-apocalypse world, discover ruins from the past, battle, collect resources and make your automated factories thrive!

name: Brews & Blood: Origin
summary: On the night of the Red Moon, you take over your uncle's liquor shop in a remote Indian village as a favor. What starts as a routine shift soon spirals into a night of terror. Will you survive until dawn?

name: Brother
summary: An adventure that will tell you the story of a boy and his family. Or rather, one of the days.

name: Bracket City
summary: In Bracket City you can solve any clue just by submitting an answer. No need to click, just type the answer to any highlighted clue and hit enter! Clues are nested within each other. Keep guessing until you solve all the clues!

name: Breach Signal
summary: Breach Signal is a 1-6 Player Co-op Psychological Horror game. Enter a special unit operating for The Agency, lead expeditions into strange places and investigate mysterious anomalies that threaten our reality.

name: Brincando com Ariê
summary: Microsite with Math games for kids

name: Brave x Junction
summary: Obtain weapons, draw cards! Do you leave it to chance or trickery? A brand-new experience, a blackjack RPG!

name: Brawlhalla: Founders Pack
summary:
The Founders Pack was DLC available for the game Brawlhalla. Prior to Brawlhalla's Open Beta phase, this DLC and the Collectors Pack were the only ways to access Brawlhalla during Alpha or Closed Beta without getting an invite code.

This pack included:
- Instant Access to both Alpha and Beta
- Founder's Insignia UI Theme
- Cogsworth Sidekick
- 320 Mammoth Coins

This pack was delisted August 26th 2015 in favor of Brawlhalla: Valhalla Pack which had everything in this pack with an additional Founder's Signet Avatar and an extra 180 Mammoth Coins.

name: Brawlhalla: Valhalla Pack
summary:
The Valhalla Pack was DLC available for the game Brawlhalla. This DLC was available to support Brawlhalla before its official release.

This pack included:
- Founder's Insignia UI Theme
- Cogsworth Sidekick
- Founder's Signet Avatar
- 500 Mammoth Coins

This pack was delisted October 30th 2018. All items from the pack can still be obtained from the Collectors Pack.

name: Brawlhalla: BCX 2016 Pack
summary:
The BCX 2016 Pack is DLC available for the game Brawlhalla. It contains exclusive items meant to commemorate the 2016 Brawlhalla World Championship.

This pack included:
- Mammoth Fan Sidekick
- BCX 2016 Avatar
- 300 Mammoth Coins

This pack was delisted November 23rd 2016.

name: Brawlhalla: PS4 Founders Pack
summary:
The PS4 Founders Pack is DLC for the game Brawlhalla. This DLC was a PS4 exclusive pack, initially released to celebrate Brawlhalla's launch into closed beta on PS4. After Brawlhalla's official release, the DLC pack was available to purchase for another year.

This pack included:
- PS4 Closed Beta Instant Access if purchased during the Closed Beta period
- All Legends Pack
- PlayStation Founder's Insignia UI Theme
- PlayStation Personal Sentry IV Sidekick
- PlayStation Founder's Signet Avatar

This DLC pack was delisted October 17th 2018, however all its contents can still be obtained from the Collectors Pack on PlayStation.

name: Brawlhalla: Collector's Pack
summary:
The Brawlhalla Collectors Pack is DLC available for the game Brawlhalla. It is the only DLC that gives unique items for each console.

On all platforms, the pack includes:
- All Legends Pack
- Asgardian Elite Weapon Skin Set
- Champion of the Brawl Bödvar Skin
- Flames of Ragnarok KO Effect
- Collector's Insignia UI Theme
- Collector's Signet Avatar
- 3500 Mammoth Coins

On PC only, this pack also includes:
- Founder's Insignia UI Theme
- Cogsworth Sidekick
- Founder's Signet Avatar

On PlayStation only, this pack also includes:
- PlayStation Founder's Insignia UI Theme
- PlayStation Personal Sentry IV Sidekick
- PlayStation Founder's Signet Avatar

On Xbox only, this pack also includes:
- Firehawk Sidekick

name: Brawlhalla X Year of Shadow Launch
summary: Celebrating the Year of Shadow the Hedgehog is back and he isn't done cleaning up Sonic's mess in Brawlhalla! This crossover mod see's a full rework of our original Shadow/Cross!

name: Brawlhalla: Spring Championship 2017 Pack
summary:
The Spring Championship 2017 Pack is DLC available for the game Brawlhalla. It contains exclusive items meant to commemorate the competitive Spring 2017 Championship.

This pack included:
- Dawn Hammer Weapon Skin
- Animated Spring Shard Emblem Avatar
- 300 Mammoth Coins

This pack was delisted June 1st 2017.

name: Brawlhalla: Summer Championship 2017 Pack
summary:
The Summer Championship 2017 Pack is DLC available for the game Brawlhalla. It contains exclusive items meant to commemorate the competitive Summer 2017 Championship.

This pack included:
- Beach King Weapon Skin
- Animated Summer Shard 2017 Avatar
- 300 Mammoth Coins

This pack was delisted August 10th 2017

name: Brawlhalla: BCX 2017 Pack
summary:
The BCX 2017 Pack is DLC available for the game Brawlhalla. It contains exclusive items meant to commemorate the 2017 Brawlhalla World Championship.

This pack included:
- Mammoth Superfan Sidekick
- BCX 2017 Avatar
- 300 Mammoth Coins

This pack was delisted November 22nd 2017.

name: Brain Challenge Spot the Real One!
summary: Spot the Real One Among the Fakes! A Fast-Paced Brain-Training “Find the Difference” Game

name: Brain IQTopia
summary: Brain IQTopia is a fun and educational brain training game. Challenge your mind with 10 mini-games focused on memory, math, problem-solving, and artistic skills. Test your IQ.

name: Brain Teaser! Spin & Build Castle
summary: Spin Panels to Build Famous Castles! A Fun Brain Puzzle to Find Your Favorite Fortress

name: Breakfall: Nuclear Winter
summary: A strategic survival game where you play a group of survivors fighting to stay alive in the aftermath of a nuclear disaster. Expand your shelter during the day and try to find supplies at night to ensure your survival.

name: Brawlhalla: Winter Championship 2018 Pack
summary:
The Winter Championship 2018 Pack is DLC available for the game Brawlhalla. It contains exclusive items meant to commemorate the competitive Winter 2018 Championship.

This pack included:
- The Frozen Edge Weapon Skin
- Animated Winter Shard 2018 Avatar
- 300 Mammoth Coins

This pack was delisted April 19th 2018

name: Brawlhalla: Spring Championship 2018 Pack
summary:
The Spring Championship 2018 Pack is DLC available for the game Brawlhalla. It contains exclusive items meant to commemorate the competitive Spring 2018 Championship.

This pack included:
- Spring Breeze Weapon Skin
- Animated Spring Shard 2018 Avatar
- 300 Mammoth Coins

This pack was delisted June 4th 2018.

name: Brawlhalla: Summer Championship 2018 Pack
summary:
The Summer Championship 2018 Pack is DLC available for the game Brawlhalla. It contains exclusive items meant to commemorate the competitive Summer 2018 Championship.

This pack included:
- Great Bite Shark Weapon Skin
- Animated Summer Shard 2018 Avatar
- 300 Mammoth Coins

This pack was delisted August 1st 2018.

name: Brawlhalla: Autumn Championship 2018 Pack
summary:
The Autumn Championship 2018 Pack is DLC for the game Brawlhalla. It contains exclusive items meant to commemorate the competitive Autumn 2018 Championship.

This pack included:
- Autumn Harvest Weapon Skin
- Animated Autumn Shard 2018
- 300 Mammoth Coins

This pack was delisted November 14th 2018.

name: Broken Keyboard Hero
summary:
During an intense gaming session, you raged so hard that you broke your keyboard.
You need to go to the repair shop to fix it.
But you can only press each key once! (per life)

Can you still make it to the store?

name: Broken Relic
summary: First day on the job. You broke a seal, unleashed a dark power, and may have doomed everyone. Now there’s only one thing to do: pretend you know what you’re doing!

name: Brainrot: Animal Quizzes
summary: Brainrot: Animal Quiz is an exciting puzzle game in which you and your friends will have to guess the popular animals from the Italian meme.

name: Brass Lament
summary: Brass Lament is an interactive experience that explores memory, trauma, and the intertwined fates of ordinary people. You step into the fragmented recollections of an aging soldier, witnessing four lives entangled by war.

name: Breakout Epilepsia
summary: A fast-paced Breakout-style arcade with a bold black-and-white aesthetic. Engage in space battles against stunning yet deadly alien foes who are determined to destroy you. Intense visuals, thrilling gameplay, and a challenge that will test your reflexes.

name: BrightGunner
summary: BrightGunner is a innovative fast-paced first person shooter game.simplicity and refreshment, the three major design concepts are: diversified gameplay, mild Rogue mechanism, and no interface design style.

name: Brainrot Tung Tung Sahur
summary: Made by memes. Powered by chaos. Your brain left the chat.

name: Brick Exorcist
summary: "Brick Exorcist" is a casual bishojo brick break game! You accidentally crossed into another world and became an exorcist. With the help of the goddess, you exorcised the beautiful girl who was possessed by the devil!

name: Breadleg
summary: Breadleg is an absurdist, comedy game about running round a scottish village as a piece of bread with legs. Encounter the people of the village and collect socks to help you escape without being eaten, whilst maybe getting involved in a bit of mischief along the way.

name: Broomstick Exorcist
summary: Play as Vikka, a street sweeper who hunts demons at night while keeping the street clean. Devour the darkness in a night filled with demons in this unique 2D, hand-drawn, Manga-inspired beat 'em-up horror adventure.

name: Brick Breaker Maker
summary: Brick Breaker Maker is a rich, element-based Arkanoid game in which you need to flexibly control the baffle to bounce the ball and break the bricks to win. The game provides level editor that can be shared in the workshop to interact with other players, which is full of fun and competition.

name: Broken Willow
summary: A girl's gone to look for her missing friend. But what will she find when she's out there?

name: Brainrot Wars
summary: Assemble your squad. Outsmart the world In free to play game Brainrot Wars! Collect, trade, and win prizes — every 3 hours, the game gives you more.

name: Broghurt
summary: Broghurt is a narrative-driven Adult visual novel and adventure game developed by Mystery Zone Games.

name: Brickies
summary:
Fast, colourful, simple, and addictive, break the brickies and bounce your way to victory.

Brickies is a fresh take on the classic breakout game, with fast paced levels that will leave you thirsty for more action.

Use the paddles to launch the ball and unleash a variety of power ups upon the brickies, but don’t worry if you miss the ball!

name: Brothel of Darkness
summary: A dark fantasy 3D vampire brothel management game for adults with RPG elements. Caterina must manage the brothel to meet her master's demands, which are blood, sacrifice and sex. Can she escape her master, or will she remain a puppet for all eternity?

name: Broken World: Save Your Children
summary: In Broken World: Save Your Children, you play as Josh, a father fighting to keep his kids alive in a zombie apocalypse. Manage resources, build shelters, and set traps as you cross an infested city to reach the airport and reunite with your wife. Every choice matters survive at any cost.

name: Bru & Boegie: Episode 1 - Get da Milk!
summary: A hand-drawn 2D surrealist comedy point-and-click adventure game.

name: Braindead
summary: Step into an adrenaline-fueled, round-based zombie survival FPS—play solo or team up with up to 3 friends online! Mow down endless hordes of the undead, earn cash from every kill, and gear up with powerful weapons, perks, upgrades, and more. The deeper you go, the deadlier it gets!

name: BroomSweeper
summary: BroomSweeper is a Minesweeper-style Roguelike puzzle game. Unmask the evil lurking at TentaTech, Inc. as you ascend through increasingly challenging floors. Assemble winning combinations from over 100 powerful items to defeat the dust bunnies and keep your job until morning!

name: Broken Prism
summary: 本作为百合向视觉系恋爱游戏，围绕着黑色海洋探索世界的秘密，出场人物均为女性

name: Broken Paradox
summary: The mad man watches, waits and never lets his prey go free.

name: Bridge to eQualia
summary:
Maggie, a security researcher moonlighting as a internet sleuth, uses her unique set of skills to investigate a case of online vandalism.

Linear narrative with no choices. No jumpscares. 14.1k words.

name: Breaker Brick Smashing
summary: Breaker Brick Smashing is an endless brick breaker challenge where new bricks constantly appear and only the sharpest shots survive. Smash your way through tougher bricks that need multiple hits, collect power-ups like extra balls and safe zones, and climb through the waves as difficulty rises. How long can you last?

name: Bratz Rhythm & Style
summary: Conquer the world of fashion with your new BFFs, the Bratz Pack!

name: Brotank
summary: "BROTANK" is a top-down action roguelike game that combines retro RPG elements. Players will adventure in a post-apocalyptic world, recruit companions, acquire powerful tanks and equipment, capture wanted criminals, and ultimately become legendary hunters!

name: Branch Collector
summary: Challenge the cold in this cozy, rogue-like survival game. Collect branches to keep your fire lit, choose shop items and upgrades to increase your chances of survival with dozens of ways to modify your game play. Remember, the cold always wins.

name: Broom and Boom
summary: Blast goblins with gunpowder and magic as you ride your assortment of broom and broom-like apparatuses in this twin stick arcade shooter. Customize your witch and cackle for Victory!

name: BraveCart
summary: A narrative turn-based puzzle adventure about an abandoned shopping cart who defies two empires and sparks a revolution!

name: Brimstone
summary: Marekind is under attack by horrors from beyond. Save your world in this fast-paced FPS inspired by old and modern classics. Use powerful guns, tactical magic, and pegasus wings to crush the otherworldly monsters into a red pulp. Fight fire... with Brimstone.

name: Broken Epoch
summary: "Broken Epoch" is a strategic battle game combining card-building and auto chess. Collect over 300 unique cards to craft your tactics, strategize in fast-paced 6-player battles, and experience the clash of multiple playstyles in 10-minute matches. Use your wisdom to emerge as the ultimate victor!

name: Break Shot Hero
summary: Collect characters and roll them into billiards-style combat! Recruit conquered foes to build your party, customizing your skills and skins. Balls to the walls action for 1-4 players!

name: Brainrot's Hamster Game
summary: a silly free endless runner depicting the 1:1 experience of a hamster

name: BrainRooms: Brainrot Backrooms
summary: BRAINROOMS is a grotesque horror born from a twisted internet: rotten memes, entities laughing at you, rooms that feel all wrong. A trashy, surreal nightmare where you scream, laugh, and lose your mind. Survive… if you can even grasp what's happening.

name: Brabatos
summary: Brabatos is a single-player medieval football action game where you lead a team of misfit heroes through ruthless tournaments across the land. The mechanics are easy to pick up but hard to master, demanding sharp reflexes and split-second decisions.

name: Breaker of Fatalism
summary: You were originally an ordinary young man, but due to an accident, you awakened the ancient artifact that was sleeping inside your body and became the "Lord of Destiny" focused on the three realms. All of this is written by your own hands with a unique destiny ending.

name: Broth Bounty
summary: Broth Bounty is a fast-paced 2D shooter inspired by classic lightgun games. Blast ingredients into a bubbling pot, dodge hazards, and adapt to roguelite challenges as you cook your way to culinary victory!

name: Brainrot: Fighting
summary: This ain’t eSports. This is memeSports

name: Brainrot Kart
summary: Brainrot Kart is a 1-8 player kart racing game. Race with the homies through chaotic maps like "Gooning Gateway" and "The Backrooms," and launch Hawk Tuahs at your rivals to throw them off course. Expect nonstop brainrot that’ll keep you on edge.

name: Brain Hack Squad
summary: Shoot, hack, and kidnap as you lead cybernetic agents in real time tactical combat with pause. Upgrade your team, brainwash enemy agents, and deploy informants as your battle rival groups for control of the city.

name: Brawl Me Blues
summary: Brawl Me Blues is a fast-paced chaotic party game about filling the screen with projectiles to eliminate one player.

name: Brian's Redemption
summary: Brian’s Redemption is a survival roguelite where you play as a cute magical feline to fight off hordes of cosmic monstrosities. Choose from a vast array of items to craft game-breaking builds and survive until all foes perish.

name: Breadskate Forever
summary: Skate through 4 worlds of intense action and- Wait... is this a golf game?

name: Broken Dimensions
summary:
In Broken Dimensions, no two puzzles are alike. Instead, two simple mechanics of rotating the world in 3 dimensions and freezing individual objects in time combine to unlock a whole universe of exciting physics-based puzzles.

Broken Dimensions is a Unity powered game developed in just 5 weeks by an interdisciplinary team of 13 students at the Danish Academy of Digital Interactive Entertainment (DADIU). It will be available for PC owners everywhere to download or play in their browser at absolutely no cost on March 29, 2011.

name: Brainfuck Challenge
summary: A minimalist programming puzzle game based on the esoteric language Brainfuck. Learn its rules, solve clever challenges, and even run your code in an external terminal.

name: Break-a-Bot
summary: Defend your spaceship in Break-a-Bot, a vibrant roguelike where you battle cyborg raiders and customize your playstyle by scavenging enemy parts. Swap body parts in fast-paced combat to adapt and survive. Protect your home and become the galaxy’s most fearsome little robot!

name: Breach: 83
summary: It's your job to safeguard reality by watching the camera feeds and identifying changes in various key locations. But be careful, too many BREACHES seep in unnoticed and it will be GAME OVER for us all.

name: Broken Needle
summary: A short horror game on RPG Maker about a father creating a body with corpses for his daughter.

name: Brain Workout! Find the Difference in Classic Art
summary:
Spot the Differences in Famous Masterpieces!
Train Your Brain and Eyes While Enjoying Art

name: Breadbulls
summary: Breadbulls is an idle economy simulator.

name: Brainrot Royale
summary: Step into Brainrot Royale and play as your favorite Italian Brainrot meme characters in a up to 16 players battle royale with tons of surprises!

name: Brno Transit
summary: Brno Transit is a narrative-driven psychological horror game about a trainee metro driver trapped in the dampest subway east of anything that matters.

name: Brainkilled
summary: BRAINKILLED is not an easy puzzle game! 2 games in 1:Main puzzle game: Based on logic, observation and interaction while clues can be hidden anywhere within the level.Math puzzle game: Requires basic as well as advanced math knowledge!

name: Brainrot: Story of Glorbo Frutodrillo & Ballerino Cappuccino
summary: Life seemed simple... until the cracks appeared. Dive into absurdity, intrigue, and uncanny coincidences in a visual novel where nothing happens by chance.

name: BRIO World
summary: Build your own BRIO train track! This app lets kids build their own train track with all the classic pieces from the world of BRIO. They can lay tracks, set out stations and figures, build their own trains and then set out to solve missions in a fantastic train world!

name: Bras
summary: Get ready to defend a school in a different Turrent Defense, where you defend and attack! Choose between 4 heroes and fight against bandits and corrupt politicians. Improve your defenses and get ready for lots of shooting, in this third-person action game!

name: Broken Sword: The Angel of Death
summary:
Steam/GOG release of "Broken Sword 4: The Angel of Death" (released as "Secrets of the Ark: A Broken Sword Game" in North America)

When a mysterious and beautiful woman rushes into George Stobbart’s office, pleading for help, he cannot know that he will be inextricably drawn into terrifying conspiracy, and a desperate search for a nefarious artifact of great and terrible power. For George, it looks like the world needs saving. Again.

name: Brain Puzzle: Tricky Quest
summary:
Congratulations on discovering a highly funny story game that will take you on an imaginative and creative journey of exploration.

In the game, you'll need to follow the storyline, using various items and skills to achieve the level objectives. These uniquely designed levels may defy your common sense and logic, requiring you to think outside the box and use your creativity and intelligence to find the best solutions. Each level is full of surprises and challenges. Friendly reminder: the method and order of using items are also very important!

Whether you enjoy brain-teasing games or want to experience unique story settings, this game will provide you with immense fun and a great sense of accomplishment.

Join us now to experience these whimsical storylines, unleash your boundless creativity, create hilarious jokes, and enjoy the thrill of solving puzzles!

name: Brutalismus: Dystopia
summary: A short, atmospheric walking simulator where brutalist architecture becomes the labyrinth of a decaying mind. Inspired by David Lynch's work, explore vast concrete spaces and unravel the story of an architect lost in his own creation.

name: BreadKnight Adventures
summary: Embark on an adventure with BreadKnight and his crew to face the fearsome AntiBread! Many quests to complete with hilarious dialogue, and mysterious characters. Turn based combat, defeat your enemies by slapping them with baguettes or cheese! Beware: Dangerous to individuals with a lack of humour.

name: Bryan's Indie Collection
summary: Discover an indie anthology of creative games crafted during my undergrad journey. Explore multiple genres and themes in this personal collection, made solo or with small teams of up to five students. Each game tells a unique story and reflects the passion behind its creation.

name: Brain Genius
summary: Brain Genius is a brain-training game developed and published by Glu Mobile, released in 2006 for Java-based mobile phones. The game features a series of rapid-fire mental exercises across categories like memory, logic, math, and visual processing.

name: Brick
summary: An old Breakout like clone on Motorola C300

name: Brew or Die
summary: Brew or Die – an RPG game with TBS elements, where potion brewing is a matter of life, duty, and... possible wealth!

name: Bruma
summary: Experience the mysterious journey of a cat searching for the memories of her friend, an old lady who has lost them.

name: Brickoid
summary:
Control four paddles at once around your ship for full 360° defense

Battle through 30 handcrafted levels with diverse brick layouts and mechanics

name: Broken Pact
summary: In a valley forgotten by time, 4 survivors struggle to complete dark rituals while fleeing a brutal killer, all trapped in a cycle of terror and secrets from the past.

name: Broken Hero: Slime Tower
summary: Become a tiny slime on his epic journey through Slime Tower, unlocking his elemental powers and discovering more about his life purpose. A pixeleted metroidvania game set in a unique fantasy action ideal for the whole family.

name: Brilliant Jigsaw
summary: Brilliant Jigsaw is a game that combines puzzles with "super" abilities, offering a fresh and diverse gameplay experience. You can complete challenges through different strategies and unlock more rewards. With rich themes, the freedom to experience and combine them brings endless puzzle-solving fun.

name: Brain Workout: 15 Puzzles for Memory, Math & Logic
summary: The ultimate mental challenge with 15 engaging puzzles designed to sharpen your mind and boost cognitive skills. Perfect for anyone who loves solving problems, testing memory, or improving logical thinking. Enhance your mental abilities with fun and rewarding puzzles!

name: Breeze of Passion
summary: Breeze of Passion is an adult game about a young guy who moves to a small seaside town to help revive a hotel. This VN is full of beautiful girls, hot MILFs, and unexpected plot twists, along with high-quality graphics and hot animation

name: Brisca
summary: Enjoy the classic Brisca card game like never before! Play quick, strategic matches using the Spanish deck. Face the AI, practice your skills, or challenge friends in online multiplayer. Easy to learn, hard to master.

name: Bring Me Home
summary: A small point and click game about helping a dog to get back home.

name: Broken Defense
summary: A tower defense and castle builder where you defend your town hall against waves of fury thieves in a procedural world that changes every time you play.

name: Bramblefort
summary: BRAMBLEFORT is a VR survival horror game built for exploration, immersion, and weighty combat. Journey through a desolate North Atlantic island, where rotting huts gradually give way to towering Victorian mansions as you make your way toward its center.

name: Breadieval
summary: Create unique baked goods by combining ingredients you find at the market. Befriend the puppet villagers by baking their favourite recipes or by combining tasty flavours. Have fun, you don't have to follow a recipe here.

name: Breadventure
summary: A lore rich, party-based RPG about the loaf who became a legend - Choose between Brawler, Thief, Chef and Saint classes, collect delicious (and romance-able) companions, then fight, cook, and schmooze your way to the top of Hester's HQ. Features multiple endings and a diverse assortment of eggs.

name: Bridge to Another World Remastered: Burnt Dreams - Collector's Edition
summary: Something strange lies beyond the mist.

name: Broke Brodie
summary: It's Broke Brodie's birthday! But just where is his family? This is a short platformer with multiple endings.

name: Brainrot Battle
summary: Goofy animals decided to start a battle! Defend your towers with brilliant gold management for sending animal units fight for you. Then collect more units to fill your deck and beat every level on the map!

name: Brainrot Animals Fighting
summary: Tralalero Tralala vs Bombordiro Crocodilo, who to choose? It's a fighting game based on a famous meme: fight with your friends and win while playing as your favorite characters!

name: Brigands
summary: Brigands is a “top-down hack and slash / beat 'em up adventure” game set in a medieval fantasy world. A local co-op game for casual gamers who like high intensity challenges for short periods of time. You can play from 1 to 4 players on a single computer.

name: Brain Workout! Jellyfish Puzzle
summary:
Spin the pieces and peek into the world of jellyfish!
A mesmerizing underwater art puzzle that you can't take your eyes off

name: Brain School
summary: Brain School is chill card-based deduction game. A set of playing cards are shown face down: Solve the code by asking questions such as "What is the sum of the face cards?" or "Where are cards with the same value?" and unlock new items that will help solve increasingly harder rounds.

name: Break Through the Door
summary: Keywords: mechanism, cracking, challenge, battle pet, battle. A wise, patient player grows powerful in Trial Grounds, bonds with an ancient battle pet, and cracks every mechanism en route. Despite repeated challenge failures, he safeguards the crystal and ascends the summit.

name: Brain Training! Perfect Memory
summary:
Just saw it a second ago—why can’t you remember!?
How far will your memory take you?

name: Bratz Rhythm & Style: Fashion Celebrity Pack
Bratz Rhythm & Style: Kumi and Felicia Pack
Bratz Rhythm & Style: Roxxi and Nevra Pack
British Voter Quiz
summary: A daily guessing game where players attempt to determine for which party a British voter cast their vote in the 2024 general election.

name: Brainrot Battle Royale
summary: Dive into Brainrot Battle Royale! Fight to the death in Ohio with the greatest brainrot characters in the ultimate Gen Z showdown. Join the fight now, aurafarmer!

name: Brain Training! Art Puzzle
summary: Spin to an aha moment! A brain-training puzzle where you complete a masterpiece by intuition

name: Brain
summary: “If the mind is a trap, then you are the key to it.” Brain is a first-person psychological horror game that offers an immersive and terrifying experience. Explore your environment and try to escape this creature that follows you like your shadow...

name: Bread Makes the Heart Aflutter
summary:
Bread Makes the Heart Aflutter is a romantic, slice-of-life, fantasy visual novel.

It follows Emile Mayer, owner of A Slice of Comfort bakery in the Kingdom of Selias, when the Fae Kingdom's royal procession brings an interesting newcomer into his life.

name: Broken Space Traveler
summary: "Broken Space Traveler" is a casual ROGUE game. Players will take on the role of travelers from different time and space, enhancing their abilities to manipulate various weapons and survive in the fragmented space.

name: Brainrot: Tralalero and The Lost Soul of AI
summary: Tralalero, a blue shark with legs and sneakers, embarks on an absurd and chaotic adventure to recover his lost voice in a bugged world filled with betrayals and humor.

name: Breath of the Pasture
summary: A heartfelt life-sim about love, land, and the magic of the countryside. Compose your very own pastoral symphony— Listen to the rain as it falls. Chase the breeze on sunny days. Watch crops reach for the sky. Let your cows and sheep rest in peace. Fall in love. Grow a farm. That is THE GAME!

name: Brew!
summary: Brew! is a game in which you run a potion stand and must make potions as per request.

name: BR Logic Pack
summary: Game bundle with 10 logical / puzzle games. Something for those who like pipes, mazes, tiles, math games, falling blocks, match3, dungeons, pixels and challenges. Ambient games, without tons of distractions. Focused on random levels.

name: Brainrot Battle Simulator
summary: Create unique battles and find out who is the best Italian Brainrot character! Choose your fighters and dive into chaotic fights-1v1, 5v3 or total chaos!

name: Brightest Star
summary: You are returning to Earth on a starship, towards your cherished goal. Enjoy the wonderful life in the world of the future. And stay true to yourself when it comes time to save mankind in a cosmic novel-size adventure through space, time, and other dimensions.

name: Brick Breaker Journeys
summary:
Introducing Brick Breaker: Journeys, an energetic and action-packed brick crusher puzzle game with a spin! Embark on an exciting adventure in this free and fun brick breaking game that takes you through fast-paced and nostalgic journeys filled with endless challenging stages! It’s time to put your strategy skills to the test.

Dive into a reimagined classic puzzle game with a unique twist: no paddles, just an array of balls for you to aim and fire at complex brick patterns. Blast your way through each level and experience the thrill of clearing all the bricks to advance to the next stage. Put your skills, logic, and puzzle brain power to work to clear the boards, but don’t worry, you’ll be able to unlock plenty of power-ups to help you blast through all the bricks.

name: BrokenLore: Don't Lie
summary: BrokenLore: DON'T LIE is psychological horror spin-off of DON’T WATCH, where lies, medication and fragile bonds blur the line between reality and nightmare.

name: Broken Rules Collection
summary: Broken Rules Collection = Old Man's Journey + Gibbon: Beyond the Trees Old Man's Journey Old Man’s Journey, a soul-searching puzzle adventure, tells a story of life, loss, reconciliation, and hope.

name: Broken Spirit
summary: Broken Spirit is a fantasy action RPG. Explore palaces, ruins, tombs, and forests across a vast world, experiencing both the splendor of history and the desolation of the apocalypse.Compose your own equipment and craft your own tactics as you battle a variety of enemies.

name: Brass & Bramble
summary: Brass & Bramble is a narrative deck-builder set in a steampunk Victorian age where myth and empire collide. As Avalon’s Envoy, battle the brass-forged Empire, uncover forgotten roots of myth, and journey from Ireland to Egypt, Japan, and beyond in story-driven expeditions.

name: Breath of Life
summary: Breath of Life - a dark third-person action RPG. You are an Incarnation, born from the Void to tread where the dead cannot rest. Each portal is a step toward the artifact "Breath of Life" and a step deeper into the abyss.

name: Brickade
summary: A skill-based journey through the world of the brick-breaking arcade genre. Master precise angle shots, get slimed, dodge falling barrels, crack open safes, or drop a precision airstrike on a swarm of flying bomb-bats blocking a laser switch... all while smashing every brick in sight.

name: Broken Race
summary: Broken Race is a roguelike racing game set in an eternal night where your exhaustion distorts reality. Run, upgrade your car, and clear levels as fast as possible while facing enemies born from your own madness.

name: Broken Aperture
summary: In Broken Aperture, players explore Freya's emotional journey through beautifully crafted environments, solving puzzles to uncover hidden memories. This narrative-driven game delves into themes of grief, memory, and self-discovery,

name: Broken Sword: The Smoking Mirror - Reforged
