summary: The award winning adventure returns with 4K visuals and remastered audio. A mysterious escapade of intrigue and deceit, in which journalist Nico Collard and her adventuring companion George Stobbart must overcome powerful forces from fulfilling their evil ambitions

name: Breathbound
summary: Breathbound– A sci-fi sandbox blending survival-building and epic battles. On oxygen-deprived alien wastelands, survivors rebuild civilization while fighting enraged "Star Dragons" spawned by ecological collapse.

name: Brand! New! Friends!
summary: Four washed-up performers become unlikely friends and attempt to take on the idol industry in this silly little Vocaloid fanfiction game.

name: Breezy Bakes Simulator
summary: Run your own seaside Italian bakery, craft pizzas and breads, and enjoy, fun with up to 4 players online!

name: Brewconomy
summary: Brewconomy is a relaxing yet challenging builder about farming, crafting, and trade. Begin with a small family workshop and grow into a thriving company. Automate production chains, expand industries, and balance resources to master your own economy.

name: Brother, Get the Oats
summary: Convince an AI powered, stubborn pig to part with his precious oats. You’ve got ten minutes, good luck!

name: Brawlborn
summary: A fast paced bullethell boxing roguelike that combines fast paced movement with beat em' up mechanics. Discover a wide range of enemies and weapons inside a dungeon full of secrets. Master the art of boxing and become strong enough to reclaim your title as the greatest boxer in the world.

name: Breakout Season
summary: Breakout Season is a ball-bouncing arcade roguelike. Aim carefully and harness the chaos to your advantage. Build game-breaking synergies, and destroy everything you can before the season ends!

name: Bread Adventure
summary: Experience a adventure in a seamless world of food, where you play as a brave bread. Freely explore interconnected regions, uncover hidden secrets, collect items to enhance your abilities, tackle challenging stages, and defeat formidable foes.

name: Brave x Junction
summary:
Do you leave it to chance or trickery?
A brand-new experience, a blackjack RPG!

name: Brass Rain
summary: Fight iconic battles of World War II in Brass Rain. Choose your side and take part in crew-based combats as infantry, tank crews, bomber gunners, or naval teams. Support your Brothers and shape the course of history.

name: Bresh
summary: BRESH is a tactical FPS with teleportation between two universes. Think on two levels. Hide and outsmart. Customize your gear and appearance.

name: Brio World: Railway
summary: Build your dream railway using BRIOs classic wooden-style parts. Lay tracks, place stations and figures, create unique train sets, and explore a charming world filled with fun missions to complete.

name: Brownie's Adventure: The Final Resolution
summary: A traditional yet wildly unique 1990s-style Point & Click adventure. Journey through a realm of rich fantasy—and, er... the midlands—as you fumble your way toward saving both worlds from almost-certain doom! Make choices, solve puzzles and enjoy a hilarious final chapter to the Brownie universe!

name: B-Ricky High School
summary: Meet Ricky in this exciting arcade game mixing flipper, brick smashing and fight. Get ready for the challenges of Arcade or Story mode and for the tough ones, settle the score in the double 2-player mode.

name: Briks Boss Battle
summary: Briks Boss Battle is a fast-paced arcade game where each level ends with a unique boss fight built into the stage. Use your deflector to bounce the ball, collect power-ups, and survive intense attacks in vibrant, high-energy arenas.

name: Brave Splat
summary: Minimalist real time strategy game in a medieval setting. Mine copper, build structures, train units and defend your kingdom. Fight off invaders. Simple game play.

name: Brainshell
summary: Stuck inside a nuclear missile, you are become one with the machine. A being born from flesh and steel, you live to serve one purpose: to fly towards death.

name: Brainrot Turbo Kart
summary:
High-speed chaos with meme-fueled racers
Unlock tracks, drivers, and abilities
Split-screen fun for two players!

name: Brain Training! Kanji Challenge
summary: Refresh Your Brain While You Play! Kanji & Trivia Quiz

name: Brother Hai's Pho Restaurant
summary: Brother Hai's Pho Restaurant is a story-driven horror game inspired by Vietnamese culture and real events, made with Godot Engine. The game offers glimpses into everyday Vietnamese life that you don't typically see in the media.

name: Brick Blast
summary: Brick Blast is designed for users to create and upload their very own games, while also being able to play other users creations.

name: Brain Workout! Spinning Animal Puzzle
summary: Spin the pieces and peek into the world of animals! A mesmerizing animal art puzzle that you can't take your eyes off

name: Breachers: Cashflow Bundle
summary:
Make every shot pay off with the Cashflow Bundle and shower your enemies in bills of death.
These weapon skins wrap your arsenal in crisp dollar-bill designs, flashing green and gold confidence with every pull of the trigger. Dominate the every map like it’s Wall Street, because real power moves require stacks. The skins are fully decked out with gold and money-bill muzzle flashes, clattery coin casino sounds, and wealthy designs.

This bundle includes:

Deluxe Taurus "Cashflow" Weapon Skin
Deluxe Spectral "Cashflow" Weapon Skin
Deluxe Omen "Cashflow" Weapon Skin
Deluxe Cadillo "Cashflow" Weapon Skin
Deluxe Vezin "Cashflow" Weapon Skin

name: Brave Saga: Artifact Reborn
summary: 《Brave Saga: Artifact Reborn》is a customizable RPG game where you take on the role of a hero, search for suitable teammates to embark on an adventure together, find the seven legendary artifacts, crush the enemy's conspiracy, and ultimately defeat powerful enemies to save the world!

name: Broken Leash: Night Shift
summary: A night at Pet Haven Gloaming Bay pet store. The clock ticks slowly, the silence weighs heavily, and every corner of the store seems to be watching you.

name: Break Through
summary: Break Through is a roguelite top-down auto-battler shooter where you command a squad of robots to break through humanity’s final defense line. Equip gear, combine hex cores to trigger set effects, and conquer ever-changing battlefields on your way back to Mars.

name: Branchbound: Launch of the Logs
summary: This is a high-score first-person shooter, where you play as a tree on a journey to save the forest from an evil wizard, where you can team up with friends (in the full version) to take him down! Fight off the oncoming forces of evil creatures and collect upgrades and abilities.

name: BrokenLore: Ascend
summary: BrokenLore: Ascend is a first-person psychological horror with climbing and stealth mechanics. Follow Ren and Yui, two rooftop climbers facing a cursed tower and the terrifying Rokurokubi. The higher they climb, the closer they get to madness—and to the truth about themselves.

name: Brickstrike
summary: Brickstrike is an online multiplayer first-person shooter set in a fully destructible and buildable voxel battlefield. Team up to dominate in a variety of competitive game modes. Featuring a variety of official and player-created maps. Enlist today!

name: Brightfall
summary: Lived through the Plague, did you? Now try surviving till morning on an island erased from the maps. Gather, build, and fight to keep your light alive in Brightfall - a co-op open world survival-craft roguelite where the darkness wants to swallow you whole.

name: Breaking Deck
summary: Welcome to BREAKING DECK — a 3D skateboarding PvP race party game where every map is a new kind of madness. Race, perform tricks, sabotage your friends, and survive the chaos long enough to cross the finish line! If you win with style, you’re a legend. If you crash at least you looked cool!

name: Brotato: Nintendo Switch 2 Edition
summary: A top-down arena shooter roguelite

name: Brain Boost Buddies
summary: Get ready for a fun and friendly brain workout! Fun, educational, and full of adorable friends - Brain Boost Buddies is perfect for the whole family!

name: Brok the InvestiGator + The Brawl Bar
summary: Investigate by day, brawl by night!

name: Brain Workout! Spinning Insect Puzzle
summary:
Spin the pieces and peek into the world of insects!
A fascinating bug art puzzle you just can’t look away from.

name: Brain Test All-Star: IQ Boost
summary: Hundreds of unique puzzles and mind-bending brain teasers are here on Steam to challenge your intellect!

name: Briar Flame
summary: A stylized action-platformer set in a world consumed by eternal thorns. Explore handcrafted zones, unlock new flame-forged upgrades, and face brutal bosses as the Young Emberhost in a desperate attempt to reach the Heart of the Briar.

name: Brine
summary: Something smells fishy in Cornwall. A mutated, violent uprising of local seafood has surged from the depths, claiming the coast for themselves. At the centre stands a disgruntled fisherman. Fight through quintessentially Cornish environments in retro FPS flair. Half the res, double the fun!

name: Bridge Orders: Outrim - The Unseen Enemy
summary: Observe the unseen enemy—and command the strike! "Bridge Orders — Outrim: The Unseen Enemy" is a sci-fi strategy game where attacks only work after confirming the enemy with Quantum Interference Waves (QIW). As captain of Samsara, you face high-stakes decisions that will shape the war.

name: Breaking And Wintering
summary: Work with your friends to create a plan to deliver presents without getting caught (Because you aren't Santa). Manage resources like Time and Christmas Spirit to help take you and your party further into the game!

name: Brainstorm
summary: BrAInstorm is a heavily stylised shoot-em-up/bullethell. dodge bullets and defeat waves of enemies while you travel through the mind to uncover the truth.

name: Broken Signal
summary: Broken Signal is a dark horror shooter where every step through the catacombs could be your last. The laboratory, once a place of science, has turned into a nightmare filled with red-eyed creatures — failed experiments that escaped control. Your only goal: survive and escape.

name: Brainwashing Academy: The Cursed Person's Pot
summary: One day, you awaken with no memories, guided only by a mysterious girl your age named Masamitsu Kanae. It turns out you've struck a deal with her uncle, granting you a powerful curse of brainwashing.

name: Brok: Natal Tail, A New Christmas - Special
Broken Arrow: Baltic Battalion
summary: The first specialization DLC for Broken Arrow introduces the Baltic Battalion, a brand-new army specialization accessible to the U.S. faction.

name: Brawlhalla X Lara Croft Bundle
summary: Become extraordinary and rise up as a hero with the Lara Croft Pack! This pack unlocks: - Lara Croft Epic Crossover - Survivor Lara Croft Alternate Skin - Temple Ruins Podium

name: Bradley the Badger
summary: Bradley, the beloved platforming icon, finds himself lost in strange new lands... and decides to fight back! Shape unfinished worlds with your game developer powers, explore a genre-bending story, and save your home in this unique action-adventure. Wishlist now and join Bradleys journey!

name: Brew & Dash
summary: Jump, duck, accelerate, and run to test your reflexes by dodging obstacles and enemies, collecting ingredients along the way to brew potions, gaining new powers, and going even further. Face challenges on randomly selected maps.

name: Brink of Broken
summary: A turn-based RPG in a world already ruined! The weapons you pick up are plentiful but fragile, you must break your foes before your weapons shatter! Explore the land in search of permanent power-ups, or win your battles with strategy alone!

name: Breathe of the Abyss
summary: A short first-person psychological horror game about repeatedly descending into the same stretch of ocean. Each dive reveals new anomalies and fragmented memories as you search for the truth hidden beneath the waves.

name: Bright Garden
summary: Bright Garden is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Brainy Inc.
summary: Think fast and test your wits with brain teasers. Can you outsmart the competition and become the smartest robot on the factory floor?

name: Brugmansia
summary: Writer Mark heads to a prestigious literary gathering, but a storm, blocked bridges, and a wrecked truck trap him on the road. Desperate, he turns onto a rural path—only to enter something no book ever prepared him for.

name: Bruisers 2D Boxing
summary:
Step into the ring and fight your way to the top in Bruisers 2D Boxing — a gritty, retro-styled boxing RPG where every punch counts and every decision shapes your career.

Welcome to the unforgiving world of professional boxing. Build your legacy from the ground up — train hard, fight smart, and manage the life of an up-and-coming fighter chasing glory. With in-depth 2D boxing action and a rich career mode, Bruisers 2D Boxing captures the raw intensity of the sport like never before.

name: Breaching Harkon
summary: Breach, upgrade, and unleash chaos in this roguelike shooter where every run builds new gunplay possibilities. Stack wild attachments, forge broken weapon combos, and dive into explosive firefights against a ruthless criminal empire.

name: Breaking Clay
summary: A goofy shooter with satisfying destruction: smash the clay world to pieces and fend off crazy cartoon creatures!

name: Bridgelands
summary: Explore the mysterious islands of Bridgelands, fight dangerous creatures, gather resources, and craft powerful gear. Discover hidden secrets, upgrade your tools, and dive into fast-paced battles across ever-changing islands. An action-packed adventure full of exploration and combat awaits.

name: Breaking Armor
summary: Operate a super-heavy tank alone on a post-apocalyptic Earth. Face enemy tanks and alien beasts across deadly missions, and upgrade your tank to survive the escalating threats.

name: Brick Breaker Revolution
summary: Play four amazing game modes delivering endless excitement: Revolution, Classic, Time Attack and Infinite Mode! Power-ups include Nukes, Magnets, Rockets, Freeze Shots, Unstoppable Fury Ball, Point Multipliers and more! Break your first brick to start a revolution and be a hero today!

name: Brekekekex
summary: Hunt frogs, clash with cultists, and survive close-range arena combat in this short, skill-driven swamp adventure.

name: BreakLoop
summary: The first brickbreaker deckbuilder! Start off with just a puny ball and build yourself an arsenal of weapons to mow down the endless waves of bricks barreling towards you. Discover powerful items and synergies as you evolve into the ultimate brick-killing machine.

name: Brok Complete Bundle
summary: The ultimate BROK collection!

name: Break Protocol
summary: The protocol has called… and it's time to destroy everything! BREAK PROTOCOL reinvents the brick-breaker roguelike: build powerful combos, exploit card synergies, and face unique enemies and bosses across increasingly dangerous sectors.

name: Brick Blast
summary: Brick Blast - Ball Breaker is an engaging bricks and balls game with simple rules, a hint of challenge, and plenty of effortless fun. Pick your angle, shoot the balls, and watch them blast through every brick in their path.

name: Brain Workout! Spinning Dog Puzzle
summary:
Spin and take a peek into the world of dogs!
A cute puzzle game where you create adorable puppy art that will make you smile.

name: Brainrot & Tung Collection 5 in 1
summary: Meme energy: fully charged.

name: Brain Centipede
summary: A top-down, action and puzzle game with thrilling boss fights, played as a linear story line. Combat imitates that of a slow top-down shooter, where the player throws various tools as a weapon. Pixel art graphics with a dark, electronic soundtrack.

name: Bring A Knife To A Gun Fight
summary: Bring a Knife to a Gun Fight, or BAKTAGF for short, is a high schooler student project that started at the Becker School of Design & Technology's Next Level Summer Games Studio. It is a 2D sidescroller action platformer in which you play as Bill Hawk (cousin of Tony Hawk), a falsely imprisoned man in a tyrannical regimes prison. Vying for his freedom, he wields a knife with a chain to make his great escape.

name: Broom Broom
summary: Grab your broom, fly over to people in need and brew them potions after a catastrophic snowstorm has hit your village! Talk to your lovely (but mostly grumpy) neighbours as you find your place in this short and cozy adventure.

name: Brazilian Drug Dealer Before 4: Demons From the Portal to Hell I Opened Are Still in the Favela and Now I Have to Save Mamadas From Ronaldo
summary: The standalone sequel of the Brazilian boomer shooter game made using the id tech 2 engine! Shoot, jump, double jump and dash! Embark on a journey throughout the state of Rio De Janeiro, São Paulo, Salvador, hell and even heaven! Save Brazil!

name: Brazzante
summary: Featuring a unique doodle aesthetic, this world is entirely hand-drawn. Your goal? Use classic 'Rock, Paper, Scissors' mechanics to survive never-ending rounds.

name: Breezevale
summary: Start a new life in Breezevale! Blend cozy farming with thrilling action in this unique RPG. Cultivate crops, unlock the potential of your animals through evolution, and explore dangerous dungeons to gather rare resources. Decorate your home, befriend locals, and find romance at your own pace!
